title: KAYAK Flights, Hotels & Cars
description:
KAYAK searches hundreds of other travel sites so you don’t have to. Book the perfect flight, hotel or rental car and save money with mobile-only rates and Private Deals. KAYAK Trips lets you organize all of your travel plans in one place including free flight status updates, airport terminal maps and security wait times. KAYAK is the only app you need for planning, booking and traveling.

SEARCH: Find great deals on flights, hotels and rental cars
• Unlock Private Deals and exclusive mobile-only rates for even more savings
• Effortlessly and securely book via the app without the need to re-enter your traveler data and credit card information.
• Pick a destination and choose flexible dates to find out when it’s best to fly.
• Filter options based on stops, airlines, departure times, amenities and much more.
• Book at the right time. Price Forecasts let you know whether your airfare is likely to go up. Price history charts show airfare trends over the last 90 days.
• Have big travel dreams but can’t decide on a destination? Use Explore to set your max airfare and see all the amazing places in the world where you can travel (whatever your budget, let us help you search!).

TRIPS: Your free personal travel assistant
• Organize your travel plans in one place, regardless of where you booked.
• Book on KAYAK or forward your booking confirmation emails to trips@kayak.com to begin building your trip. Optionally auto-import bookings from your Gmail account.
• Stay up-to-date with real-time flight status, gate change and baggage claim notifications.
• Get security wait time estimates for your flight.
• Navigate around the airport with step-by-step directions.
• Find shops, duty free, food, coffee, chargers, restrooms, lounges and more. See actual photos of each and learn whether they are before or after security.
• Countdown timers keep track of your flight’s progress and remaining layover time.
• Share your travel plans with family and friends.
• No internet access, no problem. View your itinerary and airport maps with no internet connection.

PRICE ALERTS: Never miss a deal
• Let us do the searching for you. Create a flight or hotel Price Alert and we’ll notify you when the price changes.
• Not sure where to go? Create a Price Alert for top world cities or specific regions and let the deal determine your next adventure.

FLIGHT TRACKER: Track the status of any flight
• Know if you’re arriving early or late by viewing the status of departure and arrival times.
• Monitor the flight’s progress in the air with the convenient map view.
• Easily track friends and family with the flight number or airline.

AWARDS
• Winner of 10 Webby Awards including:
• People's Voice Award for Travel Mobile Apps & Other Handheld Devices (2015)
• Webby and People's Voice Award for Travel Tablet Apps & all Other Handheld Devices (2014)
• Time Magazine: 50 Best iPhone Apps (2014)
• Wired Magazine: The 8 Best Apps for World Travelers (2014)

Discover helpful travel tips, tools and information by following our blog: https://www.kayak.com/news/

We'd love to hear from you:
https://twitter.com/kayak
mobile@kayak.com
descriptionHTML:
KAYAK searches hundreds of other travel sites so you don’t have to. Book the perfect flight, hotel or rental car and save money with mobile-only rates and Private Deals. KAYAK Trips lets you organize all of your travel plans in one place including free flight status updates, airport terminal maps and security wait times. KAYAK is the only app you need for planning, booking and traveling.

SEARCH: Find great deals on flights, hotels and rental cars
• Unlock Private Deals and exclusive mobile-only rates for even more savings
• Effortlessly and securely book via the app without the need to re-enter your traveler data and credit card information.
• Pick a destination and choose flexible dates to find out when it’s best to fly.
• Filter options based on stops, airlines, departure times, amenities and much more.
• Book at the right time. Price Forecasts let you know whether your airfare is likely to go up. Price history charts show airfare trends over the last 90 days.
• Have big travel dreams but can’t decide on a destination? Use Explore to set your max airfare and see all the amazing places in the world where you can travel (whatever your budget, let us help you search!).

TRIPS: Your free personal travel assistant
• Organize your travel plans in one place, regardless of where you booked.
• Book on KAYAK or forward your booking confirmation emails to trips@kayak.com to begin building your trip. Optionally auto-import bookings from your Gmail account.
• Stay up-to-date with real-time flight status, gate change and baggage claim notifications.
• Get security wait time estimates for your flight.
• Navigate around the airport with step-by-step directions.
• Find shops, duty free, food, coffee, chargers, restrooms, lounges and more. See actual photos of each and learn whether they are before or after security.
• Countdown timers keep track of your flight’s progress and remaining layover time.
• Share your travel plans with family and friends.
• No internet access, no problem. View your itinerary and airport maps with no internet connection.

PRICE ALERTS: Never miss a deal
• Let us do the searching for you. Create a flight or hotel Price Alert and we’ll notify you when the price changes.
• Not sure where to go? Create a Price Alert for top world cities or specific regions and let the deal determine your next adventure.

FLIGHT TRACKER: Track the status of any flight
• Know if you’re arriving early or late by viewing the status of departure and arrival times.
• Monitor the flight’s progress in the air with the convenient map view.
• Easily track friends and family with the flight number or airline.

AWARDS
• Winner of 10 Webby Awards including:
• People's Voice Award for Travel Mobile Apps & Other Handheld Devices (2015)
• Webby and People's Voice Award for Travel Tablet Apps & all Other Handheld Devices (2014)
• Time Magazine: 50 Best iPhone Apps (2014)
• Wired Magazine: The 8 Best Apps for World Travelers (2014)

Discover helpful travel tips, tools and information by following our blog: https://www.kayak.com/news/

We'd love to hear from you:
https://twitter.com/kayak
mobile@kayak.com
summary: Find, compare & book flights and hotels with KAYAK’s all-in-one travel app
recentChanges: Tired of repeating the same search filters over and over? So are we. Logged-in users can now easily re-apply recently-used search filters to any flight, hotel, or car search to see the results you care about quicker.
comments: It doesn't always show the lowest fare, but it does show current flights and has a great interface.
As others have said, android legacy systems cannot use this app. Running android 7 here, and getting no results. Uninstalling and switching elsewhere
Its easy and convenient. But some tickets can be difficult to buy
So many options. So much choice. Various tweaking methods. Price comparison, KAYAK is designed to suit your needs A*
I appreciate how there is multiple choices. For each local! Thanks Kayak!

title: Orbitz - Hotels, Flights & Package deals
description:
Orbitz is the #1 way to book travel on your mobile device. The Orbitz app lets you quickly and easily search and book flights, hotels, rental cars, activities. Plus, join Orbitz Rewards and start earning Orbucks on your flight and hotel bookings that you can instantly redeem on hotels in the app.

EARN MORE
-App bookers earn 5% on hotels and 1% on air!  
-Plus find last-minute hotel rooms nearby and save 40% with mobile exclusive deals! 

HOTELS
- Last minute hotel bookings welcome and free cancellation available!
- Pay when you book or when you arrive at the hotel. 
- Find hotels, motels, and inns around you on an easy-to-use map view.
- Review descriptions, photos, user ratings, and amenities from verified hotel guests.
- Sort results by deals, price, or reviews.
- Securely store your payment details for faster, easier, and safe bookings.  

FLIGHTS
- Save even more on your flight with our combined one-way fares and get a single price for two separately issued tickets.
- Search and book round trip or one-way flights.
- Sort flights by price, time, or duration from any airline.
- Enter a departure date and destination, and your trip-ready. Book now!

CARS
- Search thousands of cars to find cheap, quality rentals. Save big when you book in-app!
- Plan round trip rentals from any airport in the world to make your vacation, holiday or getaway a total breeze.

ACTIVITIES
- Attraction tickets without the lines.
- Book local tours.
- Book Airport shuttles.

MY TRIPS
- View your record locator, gate information, and upcoming trip details on the go.
- Plan your own vacation packages with activities, hotels, cars, and more.

APP15 coupon code Terms & Conditions
Subject to the restrictions set out in these terms and conditions, the 15% promotion code may be applied to a qualifying stand-alone hotel (not a hotel booking in combination with any other product such as flight + hotel, or flight + hotel + car) booked on a mobile device or the Orbitz app by December 31, 2020, for 1 or more nights for travel by December 31, 2021. Qualifying bookings instantly receive 15% off at check-out through the use of the promotion code. Customers are limited to one redemption of this promotion code and up to a maximum savings of $150 per booking. 

APP12 Coupon Code Terms & Conditions
Subject to the restrictions set out in these terms and conditions, the 12% promotion code may be applied to a qualifying stand-alone hotel (not a hotel booking in combination with any other product such as flight + hotel, or flight + hotel + car) booked on a mobile device or the Orbitz app by April 30, 2020, for 1 or more nights for travel by December 31, 2020. Qualifying bookings instantly receive 12% off at check-out through the use of the promotion code. Customers are limited to one redemption of this promotion code and up to a maximum savings of $100 per booking. 

After one booking, this promo code will not be able to be used again, even if the booking is cancelled. Exclusions may apply and most major hotel chains are excluded. The promotion code cannot be redeemed against taxes, supplier fees, cancellation or change fees/penalties, administrative fees or other miscellaneous charges, which are the sole responsibility of the customer. Discounts are not redeemable for cash for any reason. Promotion codes are non-transferable, not for resale, and cannot be combined with other offers or used for any booking previously made. Any attempt at fraud will be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. Void where prohibited, taxed or restricted by law. Orbitz reserves the right to change or limit the promotion in its sole discretion. Usual booking terms and conditions apply (https://www.orbitz.com/p/info-other/legal.htm) and all bookings are subject to availability.

The Orbitz app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

summary: Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.
recentChanges: We've updated our app to make it easier for you to get information about travel restrictions and change your plans accordingly.
comments: Customer service messages don't send notifications, and any messages I send to the agent immediately are not visible to the agent. A "technical snag" comes up very often. Are you aware that customers can't send chat messages to your chat agents?
App is terrible, there was no where to look at seat selection after I booked,I couldn't access my boring passes, I couldn't check in through the app. The app its self is completely useless.

Terrible...i have waited as long as 45+ minutes..and then was disconnected...terrible service...i MUST cancel my flight...have been trying for 5 days...first i had to wait to cancel 10 days before flight...now its 72 hours...what next...10 day after... have tried phone, web site. Special app. NOTHING workd
Love this app! Very good prices, its cheap, easy to use, and very convenient! 5 out of 5!
Locked out of app for an hour after only two failed login attempts? Good to know next time I need to access it before I have to board a plane that takes off in a half hour. Way to go, guys..

title: Jane's Hotel 2: Family Hero
description:
All games of the Jane's Hotel:
Jane's Hotel 1 ( https://goo.gl/9YudQa )
Jane's Hotel 3: Hotel Mania ( https://goo.gl/z3W3Ym)

What would you do, if you had a chance to restore the famous chain of hotels that used to belong to your family? Decide faster... because soon, you would have the opportunity to help Jane to get back her heritage. Rule the hotels in France, England, Japan and on the Canaries. Explore the world’s latest tendencies in hotel business and challenge yourself with a greater goal.

No one but you can make the chain of hotels prosper once again.

recentChanges:
Thank you for playing our games!
Our team is working on improving the games every day. We regularly release updates to make our games even better for you.
Each new update includes enhancement to improve game performance and stability, new functionality and even more enjoyable gameplay.
comments: This game was fun from the start but the sad part is that you need to pay to unlock the other levels please do something about it please make it free and then it will get many players!
Love this game. But was sad when i learned i had to buy it to contjnue. I had played this game before when thw whole game was free. Very sad, i must say.
It's very fun but after 4 or 5 levels u have to pay to upgrade to other levels.
If you are releasing a demo, say so. This not in app purchases, this is upgrading to the full game that you thought you already downloaded. Fraudulent and dishonest.
I like this game but the money we have to play to get the full version sucks and if I was big and in college I would pay but I'm only eighth years old and I'm playin on my moms🤳👯‍♀️

title: Dayuse: Hotel rooms for the day
description:
Book your hotel room for a few hours during the day and enjoy all the hotel's amenities with the free Dayuse.com app !

Dayuse.com is the leader in day-use hotel room reservations.

With the Dayuse.com app, you can access a selection of 3 to 5* hotels, available for a few hours during the day with up to 75% off the price of an overnight stay. Payment for your room reservation by the hour is made at the hotel and cancellation is free until the last minute.

With over 5,000 hotels to choose from, you can access the best day-use hotels in 23 countries:

France, the United Kingdom, the USA, Canada, Hong Kong, Spain, Italy, Ireland, the Netherlands, Germany, Switzerland, Austria, Australia, Luxemburg, Belgium, Brazil, the United Arab Emirates, the Czech Republic, Qatar, Bahrain, Saudi Arabia and Taiwan.

Why book a hotel for just a few hours?

Whether you are looking for a new type of workspace or a cosy place to recharge your batteries between 9 and 5, Dayuse.com is the ultimate app for an alternative hotel experience. 

From a temporary office to an intimate cocoon, a daytime hotel stay can provide a valuable private space to meet all your needs. 

How do I book a hotel room for just a few hours?

The Dayuse.com app has been designed to make booking a day-use hotel room easy, intuitive, ergonomic and interactive, providing all useful hotel information on a single page, with prices, schedules and a booking link just a click away.

1 - Find a room available for a few hours in a day-use hotel in the city of your choice
2 - Select a time slot that suits you and book without entering your bank details

What services are offered with my day-use room reservation? 

Your Dayuse booking allows you to access your hotel room for a few hours as well as all of the services a hotel can offer (WiFi, fitness centre, spa, etc).

How do I cancel my Dayuse booking?

It’s very simple – you can cancel a Dayuse booking free of charge right up until the last minute!

Dayuse: an alternative hotel experience

There are thousands of reasons why you might want to book a day room or a hotel by hour. Don't miss this new and trendy way to re-enchant the various moments of your day! Dayuse.com offers reservations by the hour and for day use at upmarket boutique hotels as well as 4 and 5-star hotels located in the most attractive neighbourhoods.

Whether you need a room for a day, for an afternoon tea or just for a lunch break, there is always a Hotel by day at Dayuse.com close to you and ready to welcome you.

Dayuse.com, leader in the day-use hotel reservation market, will make you fall in love with the concept of ‘daybreakhotels’, which are perfect for the following:

• Working quietly at a hotel on day break
• Having access to a temporary office or co-working space for a few hours 
• Organising a photo shoot or an interview
• Relaxing and taking a nap
• Turning your stopover into an enjoyable experience
• Enjoying a luxury hotel at an affordable price
• Enjoying a staycation
• Enjoying the services of a hotel, including the spa, pool, fitness centre, etc.


Enjoy your future daycation by booking rooms in hourly hotels today with the Dayuse.com app with complete peace of mind and without a credit card. Cancelling your reservation is free until the last minute.

recentChanges:
We update the Dayuse app as often as possible to improve your experience.
The last update include the following enhancements:
- Improvements to the sign-up form
- Improvements to the search engine
- Bug fixing
comments: This app is really great but I would love a rating system to be put in place. I've encountered hotels who look nothing like their picture and its just disappointing. One of the hotel I went to looked decent from the picture but the floor was all dusty, the aircon wasnt working(no air con remote either) and no tv remote.

I get what people are saying about price per day use vs. the normal overnight reservation but when there are no other options available to you this app fills this particular space nicely. I'm sure as time and competition increase so will better prices and options. For now, great app. Thank you.
Prices aren't much lower than for the whole night!

Love the DayUse App, I travel a lot for work and manage fatigue by using day stay accommodation in Melbourne 3-4 times a month. The app makes it so quick and easy to find the right accommodation for the right price and that hours that suit. A++++
Comes in clutch everytime. So far it's my favorite hotel booking app

title: Agoda – Deals on Hotels & Homes
description:
Even lower prices than our own website! The Agoda app is your best tool for finding and booking the very best deals on any kind of accommodation or flights, anywhere in the world.


- *SHOP* See the deals we can’t show on our website. Agoda guarantees the best price and it can get even better when you view on the app.


- *SAVE* Get additional savings of up to 80% from Member Deals, Last-Minute Deals, Secret Deals, newly listed Home discounts, and more.

- *FLY* Search over 200 airlines worldwide for the cheapest fares on domestic and international flights, using our unique search engine that compares flights and prices in real-time so that you can find and book the best airfare deal immediately. Enjoy our 24/7 customer support for peace of mind.


- *DISCOVER* Search over 2,000,000+ hotels, villas, BnBs, and every kind of vacation rental in your own language and currency of choice.


- *DECIDE* Choose wisely. Agoda’s useful search filters, hi-res photos, map views, local experience information, and 15+ million verified traveler reviews help you find the perfect accommodation for your specific journey and budget.


- *NO STRESS* Get support. Agoda’s app saves your voucher, details, and maps right on your device for easy check-in and printer-free travel. You can manage or amend your booking anytime, anywhere. And if something goes wrong, Agoda has live agents ready 24/7 in multiple languages to make sure your journey is as smooth as it is cost-efficient.


- *START EARNING* Become a host and start earning. For Agoda Homes hosts, our app lets you manage reservations and communicate with your guests directly. If you haven’t listed your property yet, go to agoda.com/homes today. It’s free!


- *Agoda speaks your language* Whatever your language is you can get the best Hotel deals: فنادق أجودا,安可达酒店订房,Agoda酒店,Agoda訂房,อโกด้า,תי מלון אגודה, حجوزات,اجودا,агода.


To learn more about device information used in our App, including for interest based advertising and cross-device tracking, and to exercise certain opt-out choices you may have, please see our cookie policy.

recentChanges:
Agoda now offers flights! Your trusted accommodation partner now brings you the very best updated deals on flights to your destination. So you can book your room and your flight from one great app, knowing you'll get the lowest price on both and 24/7 customer support.

Other recent improvements include:
- Send messages to a property when you have a question
- Easily recognize homes & apartments in search (pink stars)
- Host mode for Agoda Homes hosts

Explore, travel safely, and keep in touch!
comments: This app is very confusing and it doesn't feel good to use it. One example is if you want sort price from low to high, the app shows "deals" that it thinks you should see rather than what you asked to see (low to high). When I do find a place I want to look at it is very bloated and I don't feel sure I will get what I want or what agoda wants me to get.

Awful! Latest update is buggy, search for hotel in a specific location but doesn't even work. This is your core feature. Can't you get your QA work on the app to be more useful? Plus the feature on mobile is outdated, you cannot even provide a search for nationality while booking. Actually I thought your team could work better but this is absolutely disappointing. Where can I rollback to older version which it's not as horrible as this one?

Crappy, crappy app!!! Agoda application is very poorly designed. I tried to email customer service from it, and I was not able to enter my booking number, and it is a required field! Also, if I left to get the booking number from this email, your app page would reload and I would loose all the information! Whoever designed this app has not done proper testing (I work in IT for over 20 years...). Use the Booking app instead!

Agoda gave a great price. But, when I wanted to pay, they said that the VA.Number is expired. What was that meaning? I've tried 4 times and it still didn't work at all, I still cannot pay the hotels. I hope that u can improve ur services to customers. Great price is nothing when u didnt have a great and useful services & apps.

I'm very disappointed with the service ... I've successfully booked a room, but I received email that my payment hasn't been received, even though I paid in full. in the email, I've 24 hours to contact, if not confirm, the booking will be canceled. When I contact customer service Jakarta (Indonesia) there is no answer, until the pulse runs out of 50,000 no one gives explanation, just wait and wait until my pulse runs out! Very Upset!

title: Yasa Pets Hotel
description:
It’s time for a vacation … take a trip to a world of holiday fun! Check in to the Yasa Pets Hotel and eat everything in the minibar. Then float in the pool with an ice-cream, play tennis and visit a secret tropical island!


Yasa Pets Hotel is totally FREE with NO in app purchases !! 


Features include:

* Explore a luxury hotel full of fun holiday activities!
* Two families of guests to play with … cute bunnies and adorable kitties!
* The hotel is fully staffed with maids, waiters, bellboys, concierge and more!
* Enjoy delicious foods in the restaurant and on the terrace!
* Fully stacked mini-bar!
* Try on new holiday outfits! 
* Play tennis with friends and family!
* Take a dip in the pool!
* Unlock the secret island by collecting stars!
* Join the staff and make sure guests have a lovely stay!


**** Remember to connect to the internet to collect the stars ****


SECRET ISLAND : Collect 6 stars to get a boat ride to a secret tropical island full of exotic birds and rare sea shells. Try out loads of exotic fruits and drinks. Enjoy relaxing on the beach and going for a swim. 

RECEPTION : Friendly staff are always happy to help a new family check in to the hotel … once they have their room key, the bellboy will help them take their luggage up to their room!

HOTEL ROOMS : Our families of bunnies and kittens can choose between two luxury suites, each of which has two bedrooms, a bathroom and a balcony with a beautiful view!

RESTAURANT : When it’s time for a delicious afternoon tea, with cake, cupcakes sandwiches and a fresh pot of tea, there is only one place to go … the restaurant also has a full buffet of drinks and sandwiches for everyone to enjoy!

TENNIS COURT : After trying on the stylish tennis costumes in the sports shop, it’s time to play a friendly match … maybe children against parents? Or girls against boys? 

POOL : On a hot summers day nothing is better than a cool refreshing dip in the pool. Relax and float peacefully in one of the inflatable rings or see who can do the best dive from the diving board! The pool attendant is always happy to provide a fluffy new towel to dry off afterwards.

TERRACE : Spend quality time with family and friends on the hotel terrace where the only decision is whether to have an amazing fruit smoothie or an ice-cream sundae!   

STAFF AREA : The hotel staff work hard so that all the guests have a wonderful stay. There’s always lots of laundry to wash and iron after cleaning the rooms. Luckily hotel employees also have a room where they can relax after a long day and take a much deserved break. 


***


Enjoy playing Yasa Pets Hotel? Leave us a review, we love hearing from you.

For any other issues send us an email at support@yasapets.com

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more, please read our privacy policy : https://www.yasapets.com/privacy-policy/

www.facebook.com/YasaPets
www.instagram.com/yasapets
descriptionHTML:
It’s time for a vacation … take a trip to a world of holiday fun! Check in to the Yasa Pets Hotel and eat everything in the minibar. Then float in the pool with an ice-cream, play tennis and visit a secret tropical island!


Yasa Pets Hotel is totally FREE with NO in app purchases !!


Features include:

* Explore a luxury hotel full of fun holiday activities!
* Two families of guests to play with … cute bunnies and adorable kitties!
* The hotel is fully staffed with maids, waiters, bellboys, concierge and more!
* Enjoy delicious foods in the restaurant and on the terrace!
* Fully stacked mini-bar!
* Try on new holiday outfits!
* Play tennis with friends and family!
* Take a dip in the pool!
* Unlock the secret island by collecting stars!
* Join the staff and make sure guests have a lovely stay!


**** Remember to connect to the internet to collect the stars ****


SECRET ISLAND : Collect 6 stars to get a boat ride to a secret tropical island full of exotic birds and rare sea shells. Try out loads of exotic fruits and drinks. Enjoy relaxing on the beach and going for a swim.

RECEPTION : Friendly staff are always happy to help a new family check in to the hotel … once they have their room key, the bellboy will help them take their luggage up to their room!

HOTEL ROOMS : Our families of bunnies and kittens can choose between two luxury suites, each of which has two bedrooms, a bathroom and a balcony with a beautiful view!

RESTAURANT : When it’s time for a delicious afternoon tea, with cake, cupcakes sandwiches and a fresh pot of tea, there is only one place to go … the restaurant also has a full buffet of drinks and sandwiches for everyone to enjoy!

TENNIS COURT : After trying on the stylish tennis costumes in the sports shop, it’s time to play a friendly match … maybe children against parents? Or girls against boys?

POOL : On a hot summers day nothing is better than a cool refreshing dip in the pool. Relax and float peacefully in one of the inflatable rings or see who can do the best dive from the diving board! The pool attendant is always happy to provide a fluffy new towel to dry off afterwards.

TERRACE : Spend quality time with family and friends on the hotel terrace where the only decision is whether to have an amazing fruit smoothie or an ice-cream sundae!   

STAFF AREA : The hotel staff work hard so that all the guests have a wonderful stay. There’s always lots of laundry to wash and iron after cleaning the rooms. Luckily hotel employees also have a room where they can relax after a long day and take a much deserved break.


***


Enjoy playing Yasa Pets Hotel? Leave us a review, we love hearing from you.

For any other issues send us an email at support@yasapets.com

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more, please read our privacy policy : https://www.yasapets.com/privacy-policy/

www.facebook.com/YasaPets
www.instagram.com/yasapets

title: Wyndham Rewards
description:
Wyndham Hotels & Resorts, Inc.

Book stays, track points, and get offers—all on the go.

Join Wyndham Rewards to earn and redeem points for free nights at thousands of hotels, vacation club resorts, and vacation rentals worldwide.

	-	Join the program for free, book our exclusive member rate, and register for promotions directly from the app.

	-	Book a stay at any of our 9,000+ hotels across our 20 trusted brands and earn 10 points per dollar or 1,000 points—whichever is more—for every qualified stay.
 
	-	Track your points and redeem them for free and discounted nights. You can book a free night starting at just 7,500 points or a discounted night starting at just 1,500 points.
 
	-	If you’re driving and need to be hands-free, let one of our reservation agents call you to book your stay. It’s like having a travel agent in your pocket.

	-	You can also see your upcoming stays, view your digital member card, modify or cancel a reservation, and choose to receive text message reminders with your reservation details.

About Wyndham Rewards
Wyndham Rewards is a one-of-a-kind hotel loyalty program that’s simple to understand and easy to use. Members earn a minimum of 1,000 points for every qualified stay and can redeem their points for free nights at thousands of hotels, vacation club resorts, and vacation rentals around the world.

Earn and redeem points at our participating hotel brands:

Wyndham Grand®, Dolce Hotels and Resorts® by Wyndham, Wyndham, TRYP® by Wyndham, Esplendor Hotels® by Wyndham, Dazzler Hotels® by Wyndham, Trademark Collection® by Wyndham, Wingate® by Wyndham, Wyndham Garden®, AmericInn® by Wyndham, La Quinta® by Wyndham, Hawthorn Suites® by Wyndham, Microtel® by Wyndham, Ramada® by Wyndham, Baymont® by Wyndham, Days Inn® by Wyndham, Super 8® by Wyndham, Howard Johnson® by Wyndham, Travelodge® by Wyndham, and select Caesars Entertainment properties.

comments: This app is very easy to understand and use, very simple to find and reserve a room. Never a problem with the information provided in the app and unlike a lot of other apps/sites the commincation between the app and the hotels are GREAT.... everyone is always on the same page. Thanks Wyndan, GREAT JOB!!!!! KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK!!!

Horrible!!! Made reservation using app and it changed dates on me! Couldn't modify reservation as it was 10:40pm the night before I wanted to use my reward points. Tried contacting Member services as soon as I noticed the error but nobody would help me as it was close to the office closing. So I get charged twice for the same day. NEVER AGAIN!

Doesn't allow one to set up, log in or use the app. I think the app was developed in 1998 as it's very similar to the snake game where you just chase your tail for hours but never actually achieve anything. Useless junk

Other Hotel Chain Apps of todays user are great while this app is 25 year behind. User cannot look up location and add reservation. USER MUST CALL THE 800 NUMBER, an additional use of valuable time many business travelers do not have! Ability to select room based on reservation and rewards tier level is not there. Past stays and activity do not show up as this goes back to the first issue. This company has an Edison Complex as they take credit for other peoples work.

Wonderful ... Tried most and Wyndham Rewards just always comes out on top as best hotel/travel app. That's just the way it is ... Don't just take my word for it ... Try/test it yourself and see what ya think. I'm certain you'll agree Wyndham Rewards, unparralelled

title: Marriott Bonvoy
description:
The Marriott Bonvoy App makes good travel easy, with features that let you unlock your stay at more than 7,000 hotels worldwide. Wherever you go, the app is with you, giving you easy access to everything you need for your trip. Download the app today to experience the incredible benefits of Marriott Bonvoy.

Search hotels and book, or look up a reservation, all from your phone. Get our lowest rate when you book directly with Marriott. Not a Marriott Bonvoy member? Join through the app to earn and redeem points for your stays, and to take advantage of Marriott Bonvoy’s extended list of features.

Check in from anywhere with Mobile Check-in. Let us know when you’re arriving, and you’ll receive a notification when your room is ready.

With Mobile Key you can get to your room faster, and never have to worry about forgetting a key card.  Use it to open your room, parking garage, fitness center, lounge, and pool. 
Mobile Chat lets you talk directly to your hotel. Available just before, during and even after your stay, ask the front desk for local recommendations, request amenities and more while on-the go. 

Need something? Mobile Requests gives you a list of amenities to choose from to customize your stay, or even ask for something you forgot, like a comb or toothpaste.
Plan ahead while you’re out exploring. Browse and order food and drinks from your hotel’s menu at participating properties, and it will be ready when you return. 
Manage your account easily on the app. Check your point balance, view your stay history, folio, and more.

The Marriott Bonvoy App lets you unlock your stay at Marriott’s 30 brands including AC Hotels by Marriott®, Aloft® Hotels, Autograph Collection® Hotels, Bulgari®,Courtyard®, Delta Hotels®, Design HotelsTM, EDITION®, Element®, Fairfield Inn & Suites®, Four Points® by Sheraton, Gaylord Hotels®, JW Marriott®, Le Méridien®, Moxy® Hotels, Marriott Executive Apartments®, Marriott Hotels®, Marriott Vacation Club®, Protea Hotels®, Renaissance® Hotels, Residence Inn®, Sheraton®, SpringHill Suites®, St. Regis®, The Luxury Collection®, The Ritz-Carlton®, TownePlace Suites®, Tribute Portfolio®, W® Hotels and Westin® Hotels & Resorts.

recentChanges:
Bug fixes and improvements
Thank you for traveling with us! Let us know what you think of us and rate us.
comments: Reservation made easy. I called Marriott reservations, first, it was suggested to use the Bonvoy app, because I'd get a better room rate. I saved $20.00 per night (3 night) using the Bonvoy app. Looking forward to my stay in Sept. I always enjoy my stay at the Atlanta Marriott Gateway.

Probably the best hotel app out there. Small suggestion: at times my wife arrives without me at check-in, and it would be nice to add her info as a guest - as it stands my only option is to call the hotel after I book to add her to the reservation, so it kind of breaks the otherwise seamless in-app booking process.

Junk ...I am a new customer and my 1st impression is that they do not have employees or contractors that know what they are doing. This app is a nightmare & will effect their public relations in a very negative way until Marriott takes responsibility to make the app work. I think it is a horrible way to begin a relationship with a potential new client with an app that creates a negative image around the brand. Horrific.

Love the interface. The transitions are so smooth and using it is very intuitive. Using the app to book a room is a delight. It might sound like I am getting paid for this review but I am not, I just like this app.

Logging into this app is the worst! Always tells me I entered the wrong info, NO I DIDN'T!! It's too time consuming. Have to dig through emails to confirm my member number, recreate ridiculously high security passwords. Hey, Marriott your a hotel brand not a frickin financial institution. So dumb!!!

title: Resort Tycoon - Hotel Simulation
description:
Resort tycoon is a beautiful resort simulation that tests your time and resource management skills. Upgrade your resort with all the latest amenities, open kitchens, serve varieties of drinks and much more because your customers deserve the best!

Kick start your hotel management career, keep the customers happy and earn money to buy resorts all over the city and create your own chain of dream hotels. But don’t forget to keep your business strategies updated by adjusting your own demand and the profits for the items you sell in your resort.

Carry enough burgers, sandwiches and much more delicious items to cater daily customer demands. Open swimming pool and dress up customers. Soothe impatient guests before they get angry. As resort’s popularity increases, you earn more money. Experience the situation and strategy of resort business.

Create a Resort tycoon story of yours who aspired and established a successful hotel business and eventually became the great Resort Tycoon.

Game available in: English, French, Spanish, Russian, and Thai.

Game Features:

•	FREE TO PLAY, lifelong!
•	Colorful and vivid graphics, also plenty of facilities and decoration items available!
•	Simple, intuitive and addictive game-play.
•	Let’s you build and maintain your dream family vacation hangout.
•	Allows you to play offline and serve your guests without wasting data.
•	Optimized for many devices including the latest mobile phones / tablets.

Players can pay real money for in-game currency and to enhance the game-play.

The quicker you serve food, happier the customers will be. Each customer will pay money for their stay, use the money to buy upgrades, decorations or to open new resorts in city and convert your resort to a super mall.

Expand your motel by buying more rooms for the guests to stay in and renovate it with several types of decorations such as paintings, fountains, etc.

Buy and upgrade diner stands to serve various items to the customers – ice creams, soft drinks, etc. in your own supermarket. 

Game is packed with:

Real Simulation Experience
•	Enjoy every bit of managing your resort and watch it grow before your eyes. Your actions define how you'll be earning.

Stunning Visuals
•	Lively characters and beautiful decors elevate the visual quality of the game and take it to another level.
•	Detailed interiors and objects are a visual treat.

Many Decors & Upgrades
•	Beautify your resort and make it stand out.
•	Upgrade the resort and give your guests an experience that is a class apart

Helpful Boosters
•	Speed up diner service and dash your way out to tips!
•	Space crunch in your cart? Keep that extra can of soda or a sandwich ready!

Anything Else? Well...
•	Establish your very own chain of resorts; over 5 unique resorts to expand your resort tycoon chain to.
•	VIP Guests – You have to pay special attention to them in your restaurant. They are pretty generous!
•	Soothing music ensuring a pleasant stay at the resort

Download now, for free!


---------------------------------------------

IMPORTANT CONSUMER INFORMATION:

The game respects your privacy, does not store any personal information and does not allow you share this information. 

We do require a few additional Permissions to function:

1) READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE & WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
These permissions are needed to read/write data of downloaded content for new resorts.

2) ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
These permissions are needed to show suitable ad content for targeted user for better ad experience

3) ACCESS_WIFI_STATE & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
This permission is required to check internet connectivity to download new content of new resorts.

Resort Tycoon is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. Game may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.

---------------------------------------------

Resort tycoon is a beautiful resort simulation that tests your time and resource management skills. Upgrade your resort with all the latest amenities, open kitchens, serve varieties of drinks and much more because your customers deserve the best!

Kick start your hotel management career, keep the customers happy and earn money to buy resorts all over the city and create your own chain of dream hotels. But don’t forget to keep your business strategies updated by adjusting your own demand and the profits for the items you sell in your resort.

Carry enough burgers, sandwiches and much more delicious items to cater daily customer demands. Open swimming pool and dress up customers. Soothe impatient guests before they get angry. As resort’s popularity increases, you earn more money. Experience the situation and strategy of resort business.

Create a Resort tycoon story of yours who aspired and established a successful hotel business and eventually became the great Resort Tycoon.

Game available in: English, French, Spanish, Russian, and Thai.

Game Features:

• FREE TO PLAY, lifelong!
• Colorful and vivid graphics, also plenty of facilities and decoration items available!
• Simple, intuitive and addictive game-play.
• Let’s you build and maintain your dream family vacation hangout.
• Allows you to play offline and serve your guests without wasting data.
• Optimized for many devices including the latest mobile phones / tablets.

Players can pay real money for in-game currency and to enhance the game-play.

The quicker you serve food, happier the customers will be. Each customer will pay money for their stay, use the money to buy upgrades, decorations or to open new resorts in city and convert your resort to a super mall.

Expand your motel by buying more rooms for the guests to stay in and renovate it with several types of decorations such as paintings, fountains, etc.

Buy and upgrade diner stands to serve various items to the customers – ice creams, soft drinks, etc. in your own supermarket.

Game is packed with:

Real Simulation Experience
• Enjoy every bit of managing your resort and watch it grow before your eyes. Your actions define how you'll be earning.

Stunning Visuals
• Lively characters and beautiful decors elevate the visual quality of the game and take it to another level.
• Detailed interiors and objects are a visual treat.

Many Decors & Upgrades
• Beautify your resort and make it stand out.
• Upgrade the resort and give your guests an experience that is a class apart

Helpful Boosters
• Speed up diner service and dash your way out to tips!
• Space crunch in your cart? Keep that extra can of soda or a sandwich ready!

Anything Else? Well...
• Establish your very own chain of resorts; over 5 unique resorts to expand your resort tycoon chain to.
• VIP Guests – You have to pay special attention to them in your restaurant. They are pretty generous!
• Soothing music ensuring a pleasant stay at the resort

Download now, for free!


---------------------------------------------

IMPORTANT CONSUMER INFORMATION:

The game respects your privacy, does not store any personal information and does not allow you share this information.

We do require a few additional Permissions to function:

1) READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE & WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
These permissions are needed to read/write data of downloaded content for new resorts.

2) ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
These permissions are needed to show suitable ad content for targeted user for better ad experience

3) ACCESS_WIFI_STATE & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
This permission is required to check internet connectivity to download new content of new resorts.

Resort Tycoon is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. Game may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.

---------------------------------------------
summary: Kick Start & expand your resort in this beautiful hotel simulation game

title: Hilton Honors: Book Hotels
description:
Hilton Honors makes it easy to book travel, earn rewards, and enjoy your trip — and it's free.

Top app features:

-View and manage your reservations in one place
-Choose your own room from a hotel floor plan
-Use your device as your room key
-Check in and check out from the app (no front desk needed)

Member benefits:

-Get the lowest price at over 5,700 hotels when you book direct
-Earn points with every stay and redeem them for free nights
-Enjoy free WiFi, late checkout, and no charge for a second guest
-Achieve Elite member status and get perks like free breakfast, free upgrades, free bottled water, and more

Our brands:

Canopy by Hilton

summary: Book a hotel, manage your rewards and access Digital Key with Hilton Honors
recentChanges: Every update makes the Hilton Honors app your most vital travel companion. With this update, you’ll get a faster, smoother experience than ever, thanks to our team’s behind-the-scenes work.
comments: Very easy to navigate and find multiple rates in different locations. This app is much more user friendly than other travel apps. App is wonderful when it decides it wants to work. Digital key is either best feature or absolute worst. Some hotels, it works with 0 issues. Others, I stand right next to the door and it won't recognize that I'm in range to unlock it.

App used to work! Now it consistently crashes! I tried to make a hotel reservation and it crashed repeatedly! I got on the internet and got a phone number for what I thought was the Hampton Inn in Wytheville, VA where I wanted to stay! I made the reservation but when I arrived, they said that I made the reservation through a 3rd party and I didn't get my points for the stay!

I absolutely love this hotel!! Amazing! The people who work here are awesome also! If I could get my own permanent room, I'd do it. It really does feel like home. Would give 100 stars if I could. It rocks here. I wish they could do something bout the pool area...discount? Free night after 5 nights? Family movie night? Game night? Craft night? Story night?

The Hilton App is one of the easiest to use and offers great rates. Saving preferences and offering the option of self check in and room selection takes the worry out of travelling. For business travel it is great being able to get the same room to stay in the same room. Easy to navigate and lots of good ideas on vacation options.

It's a very convenient way to book reservations. You can look at rates and locations to events and restaurants. However, I want to use my points at time I book my stay. It seems to be more difficult to use points for discounts than when I first joined the Hilton Honors.

title: OYO Lite: Find Best Hotels & Book At Great Deals
description:
Book hotels with best deals now from a 850Kb OYO app.
 
Get your favourite OYO while saving on storage space on your mobile.

Now enjoy three click booking with no space or network constraints:
1. Open the APP and enter your location, or use your current location, to search nearby hotels.
2. Find top rated hotels with amenities like AC, TV, WiFi and clean linen.
3. Choose to pre-pay or pay at the hotel - get best deals on payment through different payment modes.

What's OYO Lite?
OYO Lite is an authentic small OYO app which enables smooth booking experience. 
This 850 Kb app provides hotel booking at best prices, meal plans, Wizard loyalty and all OYO offerings. Downloading an OYO app has never been easier or faster. 

Overall downloading time of this app would hardly be a few seconds while browsing and booking of hotels can take place from any network connection. Browse and book through top rated OYOs, Couple Friendly OYOs, OYOs across several locations and get the best possible deal. 

You can also book from several OYO categories like OYO Townhouse, OYO Home, Silverkey, Capital O, Collection O, Flagship hotels and Palette resorts while saving heavily on storage.  

With guaranteed-standard stays across 500 cities and 12000+ accommodations, OYO is trusted
by more than 4 million travellers every day.

Enjoy a delightful stay and book your comfortable, premium hotel/home room with OYO today !

title: Jane's Hotel 1
description:
Play Jane's Hotel! Help Jane make her dream come true and build a beautiful 5 star hotel in Jane's Hotel! 

You begin with a small 2 star hotel at the outskirts of town and work your way to the top by upgrading accommodations and achieving an excellent reputation. Keep an eye on customer moods and make them happy by building a gold course, serving them exquisite drinks and good meals, or simply cleaning their room.

- 4 different locations, 40 awesome levels to play!
- Exciting time management gameplay 
- Upgrade your hotel from 2 to 5 stars
- Choose your décor

summary: Enjoy the Jane's Hotel game on your Android Mobile Phones!
developerAddress: Cyprus, Nicosia, 41-43 Klimentos, Klimentos Tower, Flat/ Office 25
recentChanges:
Thank you for playing our games!
Our team is working on improving the games every day. We regularly release updates to make our games even better for you.

Each new update includes enhancement to improve game performance and stability, new functionality and even more enjoyable gameplay.

In this update:
- Improved game performance
- Improved game interface
- Updated saving system of different difficulty levels
comments: Aggravating!! Game is very fun but has 2 long ads per level you play and constantly has glitches I'm now on level 2 and I still watched both ads with no issues but when I try to play the game it completely freezes and is unplayable no matter what I do. I really hope these issues get fixed because I really do enjoy playing this game otherwise

Too many ads! I played this same game many years ago. I really enjoyed it. I am ok with ONE 30 second add between levels but 2. Come on, that is just greedy. This is a very old game. Not worthy of a freaking 1 minute combined commerical between each level. Please do not reply with the same canned response you gave the last complaints. Thank you.

Why I can't move my level? I'm always stuck in level 4-2 where the chambermaid doesn't come out and and the furniture are in disarranged. Could you fix this bug in this game? I'm interested at this first but then it always bugs.

It's quite good: challenging enough that it's not boring. The graphics and controls are okay, but I do wish it was less sensitive(?) because I accidentally press the wrong object quite a lot. I don't have problems with watching ads to continue playing. Besides, you can also pay for the levels for a small price. Overall a good game.

It was a super fun flashback to me until I got to level 4-2 and it glitches out so the wine bar blocks a door, I can't call on the maid and when Jane goes into the kitchen she doesn't come back. I'm very happy that I sat through the seemingly endless ads instead of purchasing since there was a glitch that makes the game unplayable so far into the story. I may try the second one, but 2 ads per level is too much to keep my interest through 2 games and I won't purchase a glitchy game.

title: Cheap hotel deals and discounts — Hotellook
description:
FIND AND COMPARE THE BEST HOTEL DEALS FROM BOOKING.COM, HOTELS.COM, AGODA, EXPEDIA AND 80 ONLINE BOOKING AGENCIES MORE WITH JUST ONE SEARCH!


Top Trending App and TOP Developer awards by Google Play.


Hotellook app — is the simplest way to compare hotels and prices across 80 leading hotel booking systems. Whether you are planning your future vacation or you’re stuck in the unfamiliar city — just press the "Hotels near me" button and Hotellook will find you the best cheap hotel! Book hotel rooms in 2 taps!

The best hotel deals from 760,000 hotels in 205 countries at your fingertips! Find the best fare in this Vegas Starterkit.

Features:

• Instant search for the cheap hotel deals available at major hotel booking sites:
With just one search we look through 80 hotel booking systems for the cheap hotels. Choose the ideal hotel, motel, hostel, apartment or any other accommodation and enjoy your stay. Book a hotel room with just a couple of clicks!

• No additional taxes and fees:
You will pay exactly the same price as you see on the screen. No hidden taxes or any unexpected fees will be added to your payment.

• Convenient search filters:
Would you like to stay only in 4* luxury hotels with suites in the city center with pets allowed, free wi-fi and parking or you prefer budget and inexpensive hotels? No problems! Hotellook filter system will help you to find hotels that best meet your needs, find and book family hotels, business or romantic deals!

• Hotel ratings and badges:
Ratings, based on real guest reviews for cheap hotels will help you to make a decision!

Destination Spring Break?

Hotellook also offers several other features for a hassle-free booking a hotel process:

• Interactive map: Call It A Night and choose the best and cheapest hotels directly from the city map.
• Additional hotel information: Get all necessary information about chosen hotel — inspiring photos, detailed description, room services, features and even panoramic Street View of the hotel.
• Prices overview: Choose your favorite booking system and finalize your hotel reservations there.
• Sorting options: Sort results by price, popularity, rating or proximity to the city center.

• Favorites: Save found very cheap hotels to your personal list and get back to them later.
• Hotels near me: One button and you will get all cheap hotels nearby and hotel rooms near me. The best Vegas Starterkit.
• Hotel discounts: Low on space? Find hotels and get cheap hotel rooms and cheap last minute hotel deals with Hotellook special offers and catch one-day discount hotels!

*NOTE: Hotellook app is a search engine that will find you the best and cheapest hotel rates for all accommodation deals and last minute hotel rooms for the Destination Spring Break. We do everything to provide you the best hotel comparison service! App allows you to compare hotel prices for very cheap hotels, hotel suites, cheap motels, apartments, hostels and hotel packages in 80 booking systems and discount hotel websites, so that you can select the best hotels and last minute hotel deal and book cheap hotels. You will be redirected to the selected booking service website to book a getaway.

Relax and Call It A Night. Find the best fare. Enjoy.

If you enjoy using Hotellook hotel search & finder and booking hotel accommodation was easy, please take a moment to leave us a nice review.

comments: This hotel is always welcoming, wonderful application. from front staff to restaurant and management to cleaning staff. The foyer is always clean and offers free apples and papers. The rooms are always clean and tidy. The food in the restaurant is exceptional with a great wine list to match. Even when there is several functions on at the same time there is plenty of parking available. Room service is quick and efficient with the food always arriving hot. I highly recommend this hotel to both bus

Most important things of this app is payment system is cool and helpline is so useful Super welcoming staff, great location, bushland views from balcony, modern decor, clean, spacious. A lovely surprise. Will definitely stay there again and have already recommended to friends. Although we didn't have time, the restaurant and room service menu also looked very good. Room rates great

A hotel is an establishment that provides paid lodging on a short-term basis. ... Hotel rooms are usually numbered (or named in some smaller hotels and B&Bs) to allow guests to identify their room. Some boutique, high-end hotels have custom decorated rooms.A good app cheap hotels very superbbbbb.

Hotels can contain hundreds of rooms and several floors; they generally have staircases, elevators and internal corridors that lead to the rooms. Motels commonly have a one- or two-floor layout and guests access their rooms directly from the parking lot. ... Motelstypically have a more utilitarian construction.

Good application. My stay at this hotel is amazing always, especially because the staff here makes you feel like family! The rooms, the food, the service and the staff everyone has always been helpful! Dinesh the manager here has helped us a lot and made our stay comfortable without any hassles. This hotel is a must visit!

title: Travelocity Hotels & Flights
description:
Book with confidence with the Travelocity Customer First Guarantee: 24/7 social support at your fingertips!

TRAVELOCITY APP FEATURES:

HOTELS
- Last minute hotel bookings welcome & free cancellation available!
- Pay when you book or when you arrive at the hotel. 
- Find hotels, motels, and inns around you on an easy-to-use map view.
- Review descriptions, photos, user ratings, and amenities from verified hotel guests.
- Securely store your payment details for faster, easier, and safe bookings. 

FLIGHTS
- Search and book round trip or one-way flights.
- Sort flights by price, time, or duration from any airline.
- Enter a departure date and destination, and your trip-ready.

ACTIVITIES
- Attraction tickets without the lines.
- Book local tours.
- Airport shuttles & more

MY TRIPS
- Share your travel plans with friends and family via Travelocity's itinerary sharing feature!
- View your record locator, gate information, and upcoming trip details on the go.
- Plan your own vacation packages with activities, hotels, cars, and more.

MANAGE
- Connect with a Customer 1st Guarantee specialist, directly through the app via Twitter or Facebook!
- Sign in through Facebook, and use the same account across all devices.
- Use the booking tracker to see your past, current and future bookings, even when you’re offline.

Travelocity gets you to your next destination cheaper than other apps thanks to the Travelocity Price Guarantee.


MOB15 coupon code Terms & Conditions
Subject to the restrictions set out in these terms and conditions, the 15% promotion code may be applied to a qualifying stand-alone hotel (not a hotel booking in combination with any other product such as flight + hotel, or flight + hotel + car) booked on a mobile device or the Travelocity app by December 31, 2020, for 1 or more nights for travel by December 31, 2021. Qualifying bookings instantly receive 15% off at check-out through the use of the promotion code. Customers are limited to one redemption of this promotion code and up to a maximum savings of $150 per booking. After the booking, this promo code will not be able to be used again, even if the booking is cancelled. Exclusions may apply and most major hotel chains are excluded. The promotion code cannot be redeemed against taxes, supplier fees, cancellation or change fees/penalties, administrative fees or other miscellaneous charges, which are the sole responsibility of the customer. Discounts are not redeemable for cash for any reason. Promotion codes are non-transferable, not for resale, and cannot be combined with other offers or used for any booking previously made. Any attempt at fraud will be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. Void where prohibited, taxed or restricted by law. Travelocity reserves the right to change or limit the promotion in its sole discretion. Usual booking terms and conditions apply (see https://www.travelocity.com/p/info-other/legal.htm) and all bookings are subject to availability.

The Travelocity app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

summary: Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.
recentChanges: We've updated our app to make it easier for you to get information about travel restrictions and change your plans accordingly.
comments: Spent over 3 hours on hold just to get hung up on. That has happened several time's now! Dont waist money on the waiver it's a gimmick and you're just spending money to lose your money. I was told this app was garbage but didn't listen. Lesson learned!! Hopefully nobody else has to go through this. Book airlines and hotels on your own through Google and save the headache

Booking was easy. Good luck with customer support. I've been trying to call for 2 days now with no response. I can't even get a hold of a real person and the AI support just keeps sending me on a loop so I can't cancel my flight. Once this trip is settled I'm never using this again

Incredibly frustrating to try and cancel a reservation using this app. In fact, it was actually impossible for me. I ended up having to cancel the hotel and the flight individually with the providers. I have since deleted and uninstalled this application and will never use Travelocity again in my life. What a joke.

Booked hotel for 3 days, due to weather, needed to cancel one night, but app only allowed total cancellation, could not contact Travelocity by phone to cancel just 1 day due to "technical difficulties" on their end. Contacted hotel to cancel 1 day, but hotel said they would do it but couldn't due to it being booked through Travelocity. After trying for 3 hrs to contact representative had to cancel through app costing me $200.00. I missed cancellation mark by one hour. Thx Travelocity for nothing

Would NOT recommend using this company! When I went to book one hotel room, the site told me that it had timed out and not went through, so naturally I did it again. I ended up being charged for 2 rooms and have been trying for days to get ahold of them to get refunded , with no luck yet. The phone lines always say "we are having technical difficulties, please call again later", no response from FB messenger, or email either. I just want my money back from my unused hotel room..

title: Girl Hotel Hostess Resort Paradise
description:
Welcome at your first day as girl hotel hostess in Resort Paradise! Serve the guests food and drinks in the hotel restaurant or juice bar, treat them in the spa / beauty salon or cleanup the room before new guests arrive in your reception. Explore all rooms in the hotel, make your guests happy and become the most famous hotel in the world!

You can play the best hotel games and make your own story a success. Be the best girl hotel hostess and finish cleaning games like a rocket! Resort Paradise is growing in popularity under guests worldwide, show them that you are working hard and give your guest a pleasant stay.

Features of Girl Hotel Hostess Resort Paradise:
- Best hotel games for girls and boys
- Take care of cleaning games to makeup your beds and rooms
- Fun and colorful levels with different tasks to complete
- Play levels or reveal the story in different game modes
- Mini games divided over multiple rooms to explore

Possible duties for you as girl hotel hostess in the hotel games of Resort Paradise:
1. Reception; check in guests at the reception.
2. Juice Bar; prepare drinks in the juice bar.
3. Lobby; cleanup games in the lobby to welcome guests.
4. Restaurant; serve customers food in the restaurant, you’re the chef!
5. Garden; prepare a flower garden and take care of everything.
6. Swimming pool; prepare the swimming pool for the summer holiday season.
7. Fitness; help guests exercise in the fitness gym of Resort Paradise.
8. Spa; treat people in the beauty salon, spa and sauna.
9. Bedroom; cleanup games in the bedroom, bathroom and balcony.
10. Bridal Suite; prepare the bridal suite for a special guest
11. Room Service; cooking food and delicious meals at the room service.
12. Elevator; bring people up and down with the elevator / lift.
13. Laundry; do the laundry of all guests and cleanup their dirty laundry.
14. Roof Terrace; cleanup the roof terrace for big parties or epic sunset bbq’s.
.. coming soon ..

Many more rooms will come in Resort Paradise if you finish the most famous hotel games with success. Play the story or choose levels yourself as a girl hotel hostess. There’s so many hotel games in Resort Paradise, that you can enjoy playing long time.

Come and play hotel games in Resort Paradise and be the best girl hotel hostess ever seen!

title: Accor All - Hotel booking
description:
Book a hotel, a boutique hotel, a 7-star establishment, a youth hostel or even a villa or apartment in over 111 countries. That’s 3,000 towns and destinations and 5,000 addresses just waiting to be discovered. 
From economy to luxury, the choice really is all yours for a city escape, a business trip, a romantic weekend or a road trip with friends.
Take your pick:  ibis, Novotel, Raffles, Fairmont, Mercure, Sofitel, Pullman, MGallery, Suite Novotel, Adagio, ibis Styles, ibis budget, hotelF1, Mama Shelter, onefinestay, Rixos Hotels, Jo&Joe, 25hours Hotels and Thalassa Sea & Spa are all present on our app.

The Accor All app is your new travel partner: 

• Prepare your stay
Search for somewhere to stay in a specific town or city or close to a particular monument, and browse photos of the rooms and venues before checking out the Tripadvisor reviews.
You can book, manage your booking and prepare your trip.
What time does the hotel open? How can I contact the hotel? How many points will you earn for this stay? Our app can answer all these questions.
Don’t forget to join our loyalty programme to enjoy a discount of up to 10% on each booking.

• During your stay
Earn Rewards points at our hotels when you stay, and on a day-to-day basis in our restaurants and bars. 

Got the travel bug? We can offer you somewhere to stay in the world’s most stunning towns and cities: 
Paris, Berlin, London, Zurich, Bangkok, Munich, Singapore, Vienna, New York City, Amsterdam, Shanghai, Hamburg, San Francisco, Brussels, Milan, Cologne, Sydney, Warsaw, Dubai, Rio de Janeiro, Prague, Hong Kong, Rome, Lisbon, Frankfurt, Budapest, Istanbul

Earn Rewards points at our hotels when you stay, and on a day-to-day basis in our restaurants and bars.

Got the travel bug? We can offer you somewhere to stay in the world’s most stunning towns and cities:
Paris, Berlin, London, Zurich, Bangkok, Munich, Singapore, Vienna, New York City, Amsterdam, Shanghai, Hamburg, San Francisco, Brussels, Milan, Cologne, Sydney, Warsaw, Dubai, Rio de Janeiro, Prague, Hong Kong, Rome, Lisbon, Frankfurt, Budapest, Istanbul

comments: Easy to navigate through and make bookings at any destination. Every hotel has photos so it's easy to see what it has to offer and location before making a booking. All the hotels information at your finger tips. Payments are a breeze no issues and you can also check yours points on a regular basis and see your history of past bookings
Another update and STILL no box to input preferential code rendering this app useless to me as I always book with a preferential code. Premier Inn is getting my business at the moment.

First of all, don't ask me to email you. Used to be a good apps. Now, it's confusing and useless. Only good at placing booking and seeing points. I cannot even see the hotels list before placing a booked date. I cannot even post a review on hotels that I have stayed so far. You have so many many bad hotels that I need to share directly with you, but I cannot post any complain nor review with your apps. Again, don't ask me to email you!
7Mar: now only shows hotels with accor plus rate! So incan see 6 of 20 hotels in the area! Cannot change the filter! Bravo on worst app ever.

Too weak app . Gives very little info and photos about hotels . Too bad concerning account info an contact details. To contact accor i had to go through browser. Doesnt give sny info about my bookings future or past. I asked confirmation email for a past booking and it sent it !!!!! It doesnt count my stay interval i still have 0 nights after i finished my stay

title: Pet Hotel – My hotel for cute animals
description:
In PetHotel, cute dogs, cheeky cats and funny rodents are waiting for you! Care for each animal that’s placed in your pension, fulfill all their needs and complete quests to grow and improve your hotel!

Care for cats, dogs and other animals in your hotel for pets!
From cute chinchillas to fluffy hamsters, many different pets are coming to your pension and need to be fussed over until their owners return. There’s a whole lot of work waiting for you, as each pet wants to be played with, fed and groomed! Of course, you can also pet and cuddle them to show them how much they are loved!

Lots of great animations and exciting quests await you
Make the kitties purr by completing as many quests as possible! Getting new toys for the dogs, expanding the rats’ enclosures... there is always a lot to do to make your animals happy. From the smallest rodent to the largest Labrador – every pet needs your loving care!

Expand your enclosures and get better items and decorations!
At the beginning, you'll start with a small pension and you'll need to successfully care for a few animals before you are able to expand. With each upgrade level, you'll improve your pet hotel's look and interior as well! You can look forward to more toys, more breeds to care for and more room for your new friends!

★ Care for cute pets such as dogs, hamsters, chinchillas and cats!
★ Buy more items, toys and decorations for your animals!
★ Complete exciting quests!
★ Expand your hotel and receive great new buildings and breeds!
★ Collect coins and animal food around the hotel!

Don’t hesitate! Play PetHotel and look after your very own animal shelter in this cute simulation!
Visit us on Facebook: facebook.com/tivolamobile

recentChanges:
Dear animal friends, we bring exciting news for you again!
This update includes technical improvements and some surprises.
Have fun playing!
comments: 5 stars all the way. This game is incredible. It is super addicting. I play it all the time. Purchases are all optional-- this is not a pay to win game as many reviews say. The graphics are incredible! Sometimes you can see glitches in the animals when they're moving, but it's not often. The enclosures are creative and fairly easy to level up. The food and treats are pretty expensive, but you can get lots of coins for hosting animals. All in all, this is an awesome game!! New favorite!

I love this game so so much it is really nice, there is a bunch of diffrent animals to take care of level's are easy but so much fun to play. It's a nice and simple game because i'm not a person who is into complacated games or apps. I've had this game for 2 years on my phone and i still love it! The best part is there are not alot of ads at all and that's really nice! Also it is very giving there is food and treats around the farm which is nice, and everything is FREE! I love it so much!

It's a really fun game but there's alot of adds and i really wanted to unlock the cat pen but it was alot of coins and i couldn't get that many between feeding costs and treat costs.(the treats are sooo expsensive they cost more than the food!) but the wheel and free snacks/food help but it would be better if they gave you more food for the animals you've unlocked intsead of the alot of food for the ones that you haven't unlocked. Also, up -grading the animal pens cost alot. It's fun though!!!!!

Tivola is probably the best creators to make animal games and games ect. And I have most of their games, the graphics are ALWAYS amazing, it's pretty realistic, and sometimes I know there can be glitches, but it's not often at all!! Tivola, I'm sorry for all the hate you've been getting..But I support you!! And I totally recommend this app if you love animals!!

I remember I got this game 3 or so years ago and let me tell you something, it was SOOOO boring. You could only take care of dogs and cats. I got this game after so long, and when I saw the features, I was in awe. That was literally the craziest thing I've ever seen in a game! I'm so happy that their is a wide variety of things to do unlike the old version. Thank you so much for making my day!

title: Radisson Hotels – Hotel Booking
description:
London? Paris? New York? Dubai? The Radisson Hotels app has everything you need to search and book a hotel in Radisson Hotel Group properties all over the world at the best online rates. 
Access more than 1,100 hotels and 8 distinctive brands with our exclusive offers to save more and enjoy more!
Enrol for free in the Radisson Rewards loyalty program  through the app and enjoy exclusive member benefits. 
Members and new members save up to 10% on the best available rate when booking with us!

Manage your account to see your points balance and redeem your points for free award nights, gift cards, prepaid cards, airline miles and much more...

You’ll always have your hotel reservations with you on the app: anytime and anywhere. Get exclusive access to special offers and deals, making room booking rewarding.

WORKS GREAT ON ANDROID
-        Add confirmed reservations and membership card
-        Available in 13 languages: English, Arabic, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Norwegian, Portuguese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Swedish

MORE BENEFITS FOR RADISSON REWARDS MEMBERS
-        Join in a single tap while booking and immediately enjoy exclusive discounts
-        Check your loyalty account status right from the app homepage
-        Easily see the benefits of your member tier level
-        Review your account activity with our easy-to-use transactions list
-        View your upcoming, past and cancelled bookings
-        Modify dates for an upcoming reservation (upon availability)
-        Check your points balance at a glance
-        Save your digital Rewards card 
-        Register for exclusive member offers and book to enjoy more savings
-        Redeem points for Free Award Nights

SEARCH AND BOOK: TIME SAVING!
-       Recent search
-       Instant search for hotels nearby tonight
-        Search by point of interest and nearby location
-        Find your perfect hotel: filter by brand, price, amenities, distance and more
-        Book our lowest rates and get special rates for Radisson Rewards members
-        Redeem your points and earn points from bookings
-        Book for yourself and for others
-        Credit card scanner for faster booking, say goodbye to manual input 
-        Paperless booking confirmation
-        Save your upcoming stay to your calendar to sync with your agenda
-        Customize your app preferences by language, currency and distance unit.
-        Any questions? Directly call / email the hotel or get in touch with your local Reservations team

MANAGE YOUR BOOKINGS WITH EASE
-        Changed your mind? Manage your upcoming bookings on the go: modify dates, update guest details or guarantee method easily
-        Re-book your favorite hotels quickly with our book again  feature
-        Retrieve upcoming reservations 

NEVER MISS GREAT DEALS THAT SUIT YOU!
-        Get access to app-exclusive offers
-        Receive notifications on special offers, limited promotions and discounts
-        Discover the best deals for you with filters functionality

READY TO GO?
Download our app now and book your next trip at one of these hotels among Radisson Collection, Radisson Blu, Radisson, Park Plaza, Radisson Red, Park Inn by Radisson, Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, and art’otel
Like the app? Rate us. Got some feedback for future improvement? We’re listening! Send your comments to rh.appfeedback@radissonhotels.com
