comments: The new app is absolutely USELESS!!! It won't let me book any rooms. Says there is an error when mapping to list. It doesn't show a correct points balance. Doesn't show any upcoming stays even though I have several booked. And before it stopped letting me book all together I still had to manually enter all my information.

Most useless app I have ever encountered. Can't log in, says Oops, something went wrong. Uninstalled and reinstalled, didn't help. Web browser works fine except it NEVER shows my upcoming stay (made a week in advance.) Expect better from a big name.
App not as well laid out nor handy as the IHG app (Holiday Inn/Holiday Inn Express). Radisson: Take at IHG and emulate it's layout and function.

Hopeless. My rating would have been 0/5 if permitted. All stays information from the old app has disappeared including future bookings. No way of knowing whether a online question has actually been sent. Unusable.

I want to give negative rating for this application. This app is very slow and unable to book the reservation. "RADISSON REWARDS" Application is far better and login functionality is disabled to create pain for us.

title: OYO - Find The Best Hotel Deals Near You
description:
Discover the most affordable, cheap hotel rooms at the world’s third-largest hotel chain. Browse from a range of OYO Hotels, Apartments and Townhouses at the best prices based on your location. Find exclusive offers only on the OYO hotel app and save extra on bookings. Now find cheap hotels in Dallas, Houston, San Antonio, Orlando and many more cities across the country with just one tap. 

Travel the world, plan last-minute trips with your gang and find an OYO hotel wherever you go. 

What’s new?

New payment methods to give you a hassle-free experience. 

Free OYO Money on signing up on the app. Use it to plan your next trip and book hotels at the lowest prices.

Three-step booking to ensure a hassle-free hotel booking experience.  

OYO Apartments: An exciting new way to travel and stay with OYO. Designed to offer a unique and local experience, these apartment rentals deliver the comforts of home with the convenience and consistency of an OYO Hotel. Use the OYO booking app to book your hotel tonight.

OYO Townhouse: Designed for the millennial traveler in you, every single element of the hotel from the breakfast menu to the booking process has been re-engineered for comfort, efficiency, convenience, and affordability. Take a family trip, or travel with friends and find cheap hotels near you & book tonight. 

More about this app

Location Friendly

Travel across the world, go on vacations and find an OYO wherever you go. Find beach houses, lake homes, cheap hotels and budget rooms with the swipe of your finger. Search and compare hotels around your city to book tonight or save your favorite rooms by tapping the heart icon on the app. Travel and use the OYO booking app to stay at cheap, affordable hotels on the go. Spend less and travel more. Splurge your saved money on what matters- attractions, shopping, dining out, trips & more. So don’t delay- grab these best buy deals and enjoy comfortable stays. Book an OYO Hotel tonight. 


Book Now, Pay Later

OYO gives you the option to reserve your room in advance and pay at the time of check-in. Reserve and book premium, cheap hotels across the USA and get exciting discounts at every booking. Book rooms with modern amenities and unmatched comfort. OYO Hotels offers a range of budget rooms so that you find great savings wherever you are headed. With the best amenities, zero cancellation charges, and pet-friendly hotels, you can enjoy cheap and ideal stays at discounted rates. So what are you waiting for? Take the trip you’ve been planning right away.

Ease of Use

Experience great service on the go. The OYO app enables you to browse a hotel’s photos, research its features and a lot more to make the right choice. All the budget hotels are centrally located and the OYO booking app lets you access them with ease. In case of a change in the travel plans, you can alter your booking with just one-tap. Our online hotel booking app provides cheap hotels at the lowest prices. Book a hotel with the OYO app and rest assured for your upcoming trip.
You can also discover OYO Homes at the Airbnb platforms. OYO Hotels has also partnered with Airbnb to provide the best hotel experience to its customers. Plan your trip with the OYO hotel or with an Airbnb tonight and enjoy the best of services. 

Personalized Updates

Going on vacation and looking for the perfect stay? Get customized alerts based on your preferences via app notifications. Find lakehouse, beach homes, Bnb’s, vacation rentals and many other facilities. Wherever you are in the city, you can always find Airbnb’s and hotels nearby with our online hotel booking app. 

So what are you waiting for? Download the OYO app and book stunning rooms at the lowest prices. With Airbnb as our latest partner, 100% comfort is ensured at OYO’s every property.

To know more about us-  click on https://www.oyohotels.com/support/home

comments: I had the worst experience with this app they made a fool out of me, I for the first time booked a hotel, made the payment also, then they reassigned me to some other place, so I cancelled it. Then made another booking which when I reached the property was not at all the same as the pictures suggested , the time were stinky and very cramped. So I had to leave the place. But it shows that I checked in and also checked out. Plus they never refunded my money. Never ever oyo again. Not reliable.

Useless app. Do not expect any refund despite their assurances that the refund will be credited in 2 weeks. My booking id is fbms3482 and case id are 22644557 & 23238622 dt 16.11.19. You want time to check your own computerised records. All details are given in this post. More than 10 weeks and stll no refund. .Mr sandeep kumar of oyo on 17/02/20 assured that refund will be creditef in 3 days, but stll no refund. Now what ? Where is the refund

This app sucks. It doesn't show hotels in the exact place we search instead shows hotels miles and miles away. Gps search is not functioning properly. The rooms shown are far away from the search location. Very very worst app ever. Fed up of this app. I feel its better to book rooms in person. I would never suggest this app to anyone. Literally disappointing and annoying.

The 1 star rating is for the lousy app, not OYO, which has some great deals. But the app is bad. Can't book with it at all because instead of showing us the booking home screen right away, it insists on showing "looking for deals" with a spinning wheel that goes on forever. If you have a slow connection, forget it. That spinning wheel page will never go away and you can't do anything with it because it is forced on you. So I still use agoda even when booking oyo properties.

Hi, my booking id is DFVT6193.I haven't received gst invoice against the same despite several messages to your team.Also, only booking receipt is provided by your team, which doesn't mention that it is electronically generated and doesn't require any signature. Update : No resolution provided on booking id DFVT6193.Same is the case with booking id XBFP8270

title: Jane's Hotel 3: Hotel Mania
description:
Our business lady Jane comes back again! In this challenging sequel to such well-known hits as Jane's Hotel and Jane's Hotel: Family Hero you are to help Jane's niece Jenny polish her hotel management skills. 

Travel all over the world together with Jenny, visit Scotland, Egypt, Monaco and Russia to become a real hotel magnate! 40 challenging time management levels and 8 exciting mini games are sure to make your journey unforgettable! Try to complete the levels with the highest score to build your own grand mansion!

Jane's Hotel Mania has a lot in store for you: interesting story line, lots of new guests, cool mini games, numerous upgrades and much more! Play Jane's Hotel Mania now, explore the latest trends in hotel business together with Jane and Jenny, become a real hotel king!

- 4 episodes in Scotland, Egypt, Monaco and Russia
- 40 time management levels
- 8 challenging mini-games
- new guests and upgrades
- fascinating graphics

Grab it while you can, and TELL YOUR FRIENDS!

Enjoy Realore Games at http://www.facebook.com/RealoreGame

comments: I think it would be great if it becomes free like other games ratings will be better then .... there is no 'download' but anywhere
I've already spent the money and lvl 5 in the 2nd location is completely impossible to beat. So I just lost that money. 🤬

this game keeps glitching with the upgrades. it does not allow me to get past day 6 in russia and when i went back to day one it wouldnt let me get past day 4. i went back again and again no passing day 4. instead of telling people to start over the bug should be fixed in the counting of happy customers. day 6 iy says 144/20.
Glitchy and slow, I expected for version 3 ,a more modern hotel. Very short for the price..
Purchased the game and now it keeps freezing. Not happy

title: Room Scanner - Hotel Deals - 50% discount
description:
Room Scanner allows you to compare and book every hotel deal available online in one search! You just cut through availability and prices from all the top travel websites around the world, including Booking.com, Expedia, Hotels.com, Agoda, Venere and many more. 


KEY FEATURES 
• Quickly and easily find hotels deals from all the top travel sites. 
• Find cheap hotels near your current location in a click. 
• Set price alerts and get notified if the price of your hotel price drops more than 10%.
• Found a hotel you love? Save it for later. Bookmark it with the heart button.
• View hotel deals in the currency of your choice. 
• 100% ad free. No annoying clutter. 
• Search hotels from the map. 
• View images, unbiased descriptions and hotel reviews to make the best choice for you. 
• Save your preferences across the app and website. 
• Clear, easy-to-use interface, in your language.
• Filter by the accommodation type you are looking for including guest houses, apartments, hostels, motels, resorts and more! 
• Members enjoy benefits such as the hottest daily hotel deals, exclusive rates, access to their searches across multiple devices and the ability to share lists with friends.

Note: Room Scanner is the search engine for hotel deals. It allows you to search and compare all the top travel sites in just one click to find cheap hotel deals. Our search partners include: Booking.com, Expedia, Hotels.com, Agoda, Venere, LateRooms, and many more. 

In other words, every hotel deal in the world is under your control.

Because of that, we guarantee to find you the best hotel deal every time. It's a promise. If you find a cheaper deal after you've booked with a site listed on Room Scanner, we'll refund you the difference.
Moreover, Room Scanner operates in over 220 countries and 42 languages, handles over 120 different currencies and aggregates more than 2 million deals from hundreds of booking sites and hotel chains. 

We've helped millions of travellers make the right accommodation decisions and we're ready to help you!

We are always happy to hear your feedback. If you enjoy using Room Scanner to find cheap hotel deals, please take a moment to leave us a review. We’d love to hear more about your hotel booking experience.


Download the Room Scanner app today.

In other words, every hotel deal in the world is under your control.

Because of that, we guarantee to find you the best hotel deal every time. It's a promise. If you find a cheaper deal after you've booked with a site listed on Room Scanner, we'll refund you the difference.
Moreover, Room Scanner operates in over 220 countries and 42 languages, handles over 120 different currencies and aggregates more than 2 million deals from hundreds of booking sites and hotel chains.

We've helped millions of travellers make the right accommodation decisions and we're ready to help you!

We are always happy to hear your feedback. If you enjoy using Room Scanner to find cheap hotel deals, please take a moment to leave us a review. We’d love to hear more about your hotel booking experience.

title: Resort Hotel: Bay Story
description:
Resort Hotel is a fun arcade puzzle game where you’ll restore a family mansion by solving the classical levels of three in a row puzzles. Build and design the estate and turn it into a first-class Resort Hotel. Become a hotel tycoon! To implement this plan, solve interesting Match 3 puzzles, get resources, and decorate the interior of the house, tropical island, and garden escapes. Enjoy new Match-3 game mechanics, adorable characters, and an exciting romantic story created in front of your eyes!


Dive into a cute story!
Resort Hotel takes you on a fun journey through a cleverly written story where you have total control over your destiny. Most choices you make here will have importance over the course of the game. Live your stories with love, romance, adventure, and drama!

Help lovely characters!
Alice comes to her uncle’s place to combine school studies with helping around the hotel. It turns out that everything here needs to be refurbished or repaired. Bring back the splendor of the hotel! To accomplish renovation tasks, obtain a key. Keys are rewards in Match 3 games, which you can play easily and quickly. There is also a host of adorable characters that add color to Resort Hotel! Would you prefer a crazy love adventure or focusing on your ambitions and career? One choice changes everything!

Solve the relaxing Match-3 puzzles!
Top Match 3 games feature gem swapping, bubble bursting and delicious treats blasting. In Resort Hotel, your goal in each one of the challenging free Match 3 games is to make a match! Swap tiles, shoot bubbles, and crush rows of colorful blocks! Form groups of three or more candies to make them disappear! Give your puzzle and matching skills a serious workout!

Build the resort!
Resort Hotel opens its doors to customers. It needs a capable hotel manager to run the day-to-day operations to keep everyone happy. But before that, repair old buildings, build new tourist facilities, create a perfect garden design, and decorate tropical locations. Upgrade your Resort Hotel to be the luxury vacation destination everyone dreams to visit!

Design the hotel!
Think about your dream house. What exactly does it look like? With this home design game, you can easily express your personal style. Have fun playing the game Resort Hotel and doing home designing. Design the hotel, its rooms, and the territory to make it just like in your dream! The only limit is your imagination!

Enjoy lively settings!
Make your Resort Hotel famous for being one of the top holiday destinations! It has everything for that! Amazing beaches, hidden bays, tropical islands allow you and your guests to experience every moment to the fullest! Build and design your own Resort Hotel, a cozy little paradise on the quiet shores of the ocean.

Use unique boosters!
In this logic puzzle game, you’ll earn coins for arranging a resort with different constructions, amusements, and decorations by completing Match 3 levels. Match and swap fruits and gems to trigger boosters! Being the relaxing Match 3 puzzle game, Resort Hotel features colorful boosters and blast combinations making matching games fun and simple!

FEATURES:
✔️ Free to play
✔️ Hundreds of challenging Match-3 puzzles with unique mechanics
✔️ Building simulation experience
✔️ Exciting storyline, fun characters
✔️ Relaxing atmosphere, vivid graphics
✔️ Plenty of decoration items available
✔️ Daily rewards
✔️ Helpful boosters
✔️ Play with friends: take part in competitions, exchange lives
✔️ Possibility to play offline
✔️ Optimized for all modern devices

Follow the mysterious story of Resort Hotel, meet new friends, and see how your own hotel rises from being run-down to a five-star resort once again. Play tournaments of fun Match 3 puzzle games and climb the ranks! Connect with friends and team up! Become a renowned hotel tycoon just by matching, blasting, swapping, and crushing puzzles!

title: CatHotel - Hotel for cute cats
description:
Manage your very own cattery: Mrs. Miller has to go on an urgent business trip and the Smiths are looking for accommodation for their house cat while they're on vacation.
Your cattery is the purrfect place for them! Care for the kitties, feed them and play with them until their owners come to pick them up again.


The features at a glance
★ Manage your own cat hotel
★ Develop your cattery from a small hotel into a 5-star luxury accommodation for the little sweeties
★ From the trusting Maine Coon to the graceful Burma – care for and feed six different breeds of cats
★ Decorate and design your cat hotel with individual objects
★ Play with your cats using the cat teaser toy, motivate them with the laser pointer game or groom their fur with different brushes
★ Watch how the cats play together, chase each other and sleep peacefully in their baskets


Take on exciting challenges every day!
Every cat is different – the cuddly British Shorthair tomcat loves being petted, while Maggy, the curious ragdoll, finds the laser pointer game great fun. You can take care of six different cat breeds in total.
Find out the likes of each individual cat and take loving care of your feline friends.
Check the health of the cats at check-in. Then your kitty guests need to be cared for, petted and fed. And that's when your day really starts!


It's never boring in the playroom  
There are various items waiting for you in the playroom: you can use the laser pointer to chase the cats around the playroom – breaking a vase or two along the way!
You need a good memory and nerves of steel for the cat memory game, because if you don't memorize all the items correctly, a glass might get knocked over!
And do you know the cat teaser? Your hotel guests will love it and it'll keep them fit too.


Long-lasting fun thanks to increasing difficulty
If you take loving care of the cats, your cattery will soon become too small. Expand the rooms with cat trees, baskets and more litter trays so you can take in more guests.
But your furry friends will get more and more demanding. They'll need more attention and their individual needs will increase. But the more successful you are, the more stars your hotel will get and the more decorations will be available. And then you’ll be able to care for more different cats.


So quickly, download CatHotel and open your very own cattery!


 Support 
If you have questions or problems related to the app or in-app purchases, please feel free to contact us via our facebook page facebook.com/tivolamobile

description:
Last minute hotel booking app helps you to find the best and cheap hotels around the globe. Our app help to find perfect budget hotels with guaranteed lowest price online. We help you to cover various online hotel booking companies such as wego, hotels com, Expedia, last minute, hotel tonight, Trip advisor, hotels combined, hotel look, musafir, rahlat, scoosh, home away, vrbo and much more. You can get the domestic, as well as the international hotel, stay here. The cheap price guaranteed. 

Our comparing system comprises all hotels combined around the globe. You can find business, luxury, honeymoon, budget hotels, Low-cost rooms and more here. Refine your search by a variety of accommodation, amenities, and other parameters. 20 million amazing guest to reviews help you find the exact condition of the hotel you are booking. 

You can use the "Near Me" choice to get the most suitable hotel booking dealings near you. We also provide perfect last minute deals for any of your stays. title: Meliá · Room booking, hotels and stays
description:
With Meliá you’ll experience our warm Spanish hospitality every time you stay with us 

From exclusive luxury hotels, to laid back family resorts and sophisticated city breaks, we look after you through every moment. 

Our app will be the perfect travel companion. You can access to a host of useful services and exclusive rewards to enjoy.

Download the app and get special gifts

Choose the Meliá experience for your holidays or business travels:

✔️ Explore our global range of hotels and resorts for family holidays 
✔️ Find a hotel near you. Make and manage your booking on your mobile
✔️ View all our hotel photos, services and locations
✔️Enjoy private discounts and latest deals when you book a room through our free MeliáRewards programme
✔️ Guaranteed best online rate 
✔️ Earn MeliáRewards points for every booking and stay
✔️ Save bookings and your MeliáRewards card into Wallet

Let us make the most of your stay

- Manage your bookings 24/7 all year round, wherever you are
- Carry out your check-in online
- Digital key: you can open your room with your smartphone
- Request hotel services like special pillows, amenities or maintenance at any time
- Book hotel restaurants, spa, premium services…
- Upgrade your room’s category
- Join our MeliáRewards programme for free to extra benefits
- Earn MeliáRewards points and redeem for hotel stays, services and spas, and with our range of partners
- Enjoy surprise gifts
- Exclusive prices and the best value deals
- Your MeliáRewards account details at your fingertips on your mobile

Find your Meliá experience 

With over 370 hotels in 43 countries, across 4 continents around the world, we’ll help you find the Meliá that suits you: 

Gran Meliá Hotels & Resorts
Sophisticated glamour and timeless standards. 

ME by Meliá
Found in the capitals of culture and cool, ME is design, art, music and services. 

Paradisus by Meliá
Choose your plan: Activity, adventures, tranquility. Forget your watch and wallet and enjoy.

Meliá Hotels & Resorts
Every sensation. Every conversation. Every detail that surprises you.

Innside by Meliá
Sleek style collides for experiences beyond the ordinary. BE INSPIRED. 

Tryp by Wyndham
We’ll make sure you have access to the exciting action and amazing food that our cities have to offer. 

Sol by Meliá
Whether you’re all about the family, in need of relaxation, moved by music or driven by adventure.

Meliá Hotels International is is a worldwide recognized company which has the following awards among others:

🏆 The AppTourism Awards 2019: 2019 Best app of tourist services
🏆 Brand Finance: 2019 hotel most valuable brand in Spain
🏆 SAP: 2018 best ‘Fast Delivery Project’ 
🏆 European Hospitality Awards: 2017 best technology using


If you have experienced any problems with the app please write us to appsupport@melia.com.
 
For more information about Meliá Hotels International, check our website https://www.melia.com and on our social media channels:

⭐ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Melia.Hotels
⭐ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/meliahtlresorts
⭐ Twitter: https://twitter.com/meliahotelsint

There is also no 5% discount. Bad experience.

title: Hotel Deals - Bookings & Discounts
description:
🏨 Find a stay any time any where and make a hotel booking. Hotel Deals travel app is easy fast and secure way to find discounts for your hotel accommodation.

APP FEATURES:

🔍 Compare Prices: Comparing prices of different booking rates from major travel agencies i.e. Expedia, Booking.com, Orbitz, cTrip, Wotif, Hotels.com, Amoma, HotelsClick, Elvoline, Getaroom, Hilton, Best Western, Olotels, Otel.com, Skoosh, Priceline, HotelTonight, Laterooms, Agoda, Lastminute, ebooker or directly from the Hotel

👍 Best Deals: Helps you find the best price at the time of booking.

✔️ Instant booking confirmation: Once you book your hotel room, you will immediately get a confirmation of reservation from the hotel via email or text.

😊 Genuine reviews: Get genuine user reviews about the service, cost, and comfort of hotels.

⭐ Star ratings: Filter hotels based on the star ratings given by experts. A high rating for a hotel implies better security, comfort, and proximity to famous tourist spots. 

🌐 Choice of languages: The app is available in many languages, that you can select from based on your preference.

💱 Multi-currency view: If you are not familiar with the language spoken in the region you are traveling to, you can switch to the multi-currency view offered by the app. It will allow you to choose your preferred currency to view the hotel prices and know the exact cost.

💁 User friendly: The app is very user-friendly, allowing users to book their accommodation in advance. In addition, it has a novel flash screen and icon image to improve the readability and usability of the app. 

📲 Please visit our full website at http://www.bedroomchecker.com

title: HOTEL GURU - Find discounted hotels & hotel deals
description:
HOTEL GURU allows you to compare and book every hotel deal available online in one search! You just cut through availability and prices from all the top travel websites around the world, including Booking.com, Expedia, Hotels.com, Agoda, Venere and many more. 

KEY FEATURES 
• Quickly and easily find hotels deals from all the top travel sites. 
• Find cheap hotels near your current location in a click. 
• Set price alerts and get notified if the price of your hotel price drops more than 10%.
• Found a hotel you love? Save it for later. Bookmark it with the heart button.
• View hotel deals in the currency of your choice. 
• 100% without ads. No annoying clutter. 
• Search hotels from the map. 
• View images, unbiased descriptions and hotel reviews to make the best choice for you. 
• Save your preferences across the app and website. 
• Clear, easy-to-use interface, in your language.
• Filter by the accommodation type you are looking for including guest houses, apartments, hostels, motels, resorts and more! 
• Members enjoy benefits such as the hottest daily hotel deals, exclusive rates, access to their searches across multiple devices and the ability to share lists with friends.

Note: HOTEL GURU is the search engine for hotel deals. It allows you to search and compare all the top travel sites in just one click to find cheap hotel deals. Our search partners include: Booking.com, Expedia, Hotels.com, Agoda, Venere, LateRooms, and many more. 

In other words, every hotel deal in the world is under your control.

Because of that, we guarantee to find you the best hotel deal every time. It's a promise. If you find a cheaper deal after you've booked with a site listed on HOTEL GURU, we'll refund you the difference.
Moreover, HOTEL GURU operates in over 220 countries and 42 languages, handles over 120 different currencies and aggregates more than 2 million deals from hundreds of booking sites and hotel chains. 

We've helped millions of travellers make the right accommodation decisions and we're ready to help you!

We are always happy to hear your feedback. If you enjoy using HOTEL GURU to find cheap hotel deals, please take a moment to leave us a review. We’d love to hear more about your hotel booking experience.

Download the HOTEL GURU app today.

We've helped millions of travellers make the right accommodation decisions and we're ready to help you!

Download the HOTEL GURU app today.

title: Trip.com: Flights, Hotels, Train & Travel Deals
description:
Trip.com is your one-stop travel app! Book with us for great deals on:

■ Flights: International and domestic flights at great rates with no booking fees.
■ Hotels: Choose from over 1.2 million hotels, resorts, and apartments around the world.
■ Trains: Book tickets for the UK, Germany, Mainland China, Taiwan and Korea.
■ Tickets & Tours: Book attraction tickets in seconds, or take a private tour instead.
■ Rental Cars: Reserve your rental car online. Select from hundreds of makes and models.
■ Airport Transfers: Get picked up straight from the airport, no need to wait for a taxi.
■ Travel Guide: Not sure where you want to go yet? No problem – we can help!

The Trip.com app makes it easy to book hotels, flights, and trains at great prices. Quickly find the latest deals, check out exclusive member offers, and enjoy zero booking fees on flights and hotels. Join the thousands who already use Trip.com and save on your next trip! 

**Detailed Features List**

Find cheap hotels in minutes
- Select from more than 1.2 million hotels, resorts, and apartments around the world — you name it, we’ve got it!
- Still unsure about your plans? Cancel or modify your booking directly in the app.
- Sort by what's important to you: hotel prices, deals, ratings and more.
- Advanced filters help you find accommodation in your price range, in the ideal location, and with the facilities you want (like free Wi-Fi and a swimming pool).
- Over 30 million verified hotel reviews help you make your decision.
- Access your booking information offline for extra convenience.

Book the perfect flight
- Book cheap flights to over 5,000 cities around the world.
- Our advanced flight search engine allows you to find the ideal flight filtering by price, duration, departure or arrival time, or airline and stops.
- Cancel or modify your bookings easily right in the app.
- Need to fly into one city, but then fly out of another? Our multi-city search function can piece together your perfect flight.
- Have a fixed budget, but not sure where to go? Check out our Explore the World feature for the some great suggestions.

Search train tickets
- Easily book train tickets for Mainland China, Taiwan, the UK, Korea, and Germany all in one app!
- We connect directly with local train information centers, so you’ll see the most up-to-date information and prices.

Tickets and tours
- Whether you’re looking for Disneyland tickets, a skip-the-line pass to the Louvre, or an air ballooning experience, you’ll find it on the Trip.com app.
- Book a multi-day tour to see the sights of China, or a day trip for your Dubai stopover.

Reserve a Rental car
- Rent a car in thousands of destinations across the globe for a bargain price.
- Free cancellation is available on most bookings.

Arrange Airport transfer
- Never wait in a taxi queue again. Arrange for a professional driver to pick you up from the airport for an easy experience.
- Cancel up to 24 hours before pickup free of charge.

Manage your trips in app
- Track your flight status on the go.
- Add your itinerary to your calendar or save it as a photo for a smooth vacation.
- Get notifications on booking changes and much more!

We speak your language
- The app is available in 19 different languages, with payment available in 22 currencies.
- 24/7 English customer service is always at hand to help. Call, email, or chat to us directly in the app.

Need a luxury hotel in New York, or a last minute hostel in Prague? Maybe a budget flight with Air Asia or the luxury of first class on Emirates? Taking the train from London to Edinburgh? Or maybe heading down to Busan from Seoul? Wherever your journey takes you, Trip.com is the only travel app you’ll need!

comments: More than the app the problem is their costumer service. 5 mails sent, 5 times they replied without spending one second to understand my needs, and without solving my problem. In other words, if you book with them, forget the chance to indicate your frequent flyer number, as in my case, and for 4 different flights, it was not possible. Never again.

The APP is not real time and definitely useless . I purchased ticket on february for a march 25 flt. I supposed to be asking for rebooking or refund because of flt cancellations due to covid, however my flt is not even listed in the app. My hard earned money will be wasted! I also emailed several times but an automatic reply has been sent with a useless message. Not useful at all!

This app is soo hard to cancel and the design is confusing. And because of the design, I was able to purchase additional baggage to my return flight instead of from origin flight. I tried to cancel it right away, just 2 minutes but there was no support, no customer support at all. And they still purchase it without minding the customers side. It would be better to purchase your flight right away to flight companies than making use of their useless service. Their service is only for making money

SCAM! Very deceptive and trashy app. It will change the price right as you're getting ready to pay. I checked actual airline site as well as others (couldnt use them because of my foreign credit card) mulptle times and the price hadnt change. The only amount that changed was the fees which began at 10 dollars and jumped up to 30. Pathetic they would stoop so low. That kind of trash should be criminal. Especially during a crisis!
I booked my ticket in this app but i cannot find my booking number in the airline official website. Now i cannot requesta refund for my cancelled flight. This company is only after your money.

title: Airbnb
description:
Unforgettable travel experiences start with Airbnb. Find travel adventures and new places to go far away or near to you, and access vacation home rentals, new experiences, and places to visit all around the world. Book everything for your trip, or start earning money as a host. 

BOOK TRAVEL EXPERIENCES
Go on local experiences led by native experts, whether it’s for multiple days or just an afternoon. Explore Seoul's underground music scene, hunt for truffles in a Tuscan forest, or give back to the community with a social impact experience.

BOOK VACATION HOMES
Choose from over 6 million vacation home rentals across 191+ countries. Search by price, neighborhood, amenities, and more.

POPULAR DESTINATIONS
Experience the beautiful sights & find local guides for the perfect vacation:
• Rio – Explore the birthplace of Samba or hang glide over the sights
• Paris – Find your fill in some of the best culinary tours and museums
• Barcelona – Discover the cities beauty with guided walking tours

For travelers: 
• Book vacation home rentals and travel experiences for your next solo journey, family vacation, or business trip
• Search for last minute travel accommodations or long term rentals
• Save your favorite rental homes, experiences, and places—and invite friends and family to plan the trip with you
• Add experiences and events to your itinerary
• Message your host and get directions to your home

For hosts:
• Share your extra space or lead experiences that showcase what makes your city great
• Update your listing and calendar availability
• Share what’s special about your neighborhood with a host guidebook
• Message guests and manage their reservations

summary: Find the perfect vacation rental, live like a local, discover new experiences.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Spam spam spam. I have never seen an app that feels the need to spam both your sms, push and email notifications by default for opportunities for bookings. This is plain marketing manipulation. Be better guys. Manufacturers are trying to get people to look at their phones less and now you're pulling them in with every single means possible. Do better!

The app is okay I guess, but customer service is horrible. I called in understanding I would have to stay on hold to talk to a representative but after not recieving any wait times and completing the same automated loop twice it hung up on me. This happened two times. If you are looking for a company that cares about customer service this isn't the one.

I travel for work & have used ABB over the past year. Pros: ABB is global. It is THEE App to use for work travel & vacationing. It is fairly easy to use, once you learn how to navigate the program. Cons: I don't like that you cannot book multiple reservations at one time, each one a separate transaction. And that availability is not displayed in real time. Also messages don't always display right away. Consumer Advice: always use the "Instant Book" feature.

Great app, easy to use, just with a few quirks. 1) The ratings are shown rounded to the nearest 0.5 so you often think they are more highly rated than they are (this definitely applies to your Saved lists, not sure elsewhere). 2) There isn't a way to change your payment methods unless you are about to book a place (or at least I couldn't find it). 3) When looking at a saved list alongside someone else (both using the app), we saw different prices - mine included service charge; his didnt.

It's a great service really. I understand they are likely to take the blame for bad services provided by hosts which is unfair but I had one issue with the App company itself which I feel should be addressed. If you do not use the App for a long time and forget your password, the recovery and reactivation process is overkill. It's good to have tight security, but in my situation, it worked against me. How can some one abroad auenticate with their (likely) native phone? Security question, plz!

title: World of Hyatt
description:
OUR APP REVOLVES AROUND YOU
From trip planning to checkout the World of Hyatt app is here for you, with easy access to more than 900 distinctive hotels and a suite of features right at your fingertips.  Not a member? Join and instantly your travel is more rewarding.

FEATURES
Manage your trip with ease. 
• Enjoy exclusive member rates
• Use your World of Hyatt points to book stays
• Explore our hotels with photos, hotel details, offers, local area attractions and more
• Save your favorite hotels for future quick booking
• Online Check-In/Express Checkout: Bypass the front desk when you arrive and depart
• Real-Time Charges: View your room charges during your stay
• Past Activity: View and download folios from previous stays

Make the most of your stay. 
• Guest Requests: Request items to your room, such as towels and toothpaste (supported at 300+ hotels)
• Hyatt Mobile Entry: Use your device as your room key (available at select hotels)
• Google Chromecast: Stream your favorite shows right to your room’s TV (available at select hotels)

Access your account instantly.
• Track your progress toward elite tiers and Milestone Rewards
• View your current benefits and explore other elite tier benefits
• Track your progress toward free night Awards via our Brand Explorer
• Access your available earned Awards

When booking through our app, you’ll always receive the best published rate without any booking fees at our more than 900 hotels across Park Hyatt®, Miraval®, Grand Hyatt®, Alila®, Andaz®, The Unbound Collection by Hyatt®, Hyatt Regency®, Hyatt®, Hyatt Ziva™, Hyatt Zilara™, Thompson Hotels®, Hyatt Centric®, Hyatt House®, Hyatt Place®, Joie de Vivre® and Hyatt Residence Club®. 

- Available in English, Spanish, German, French, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional) and Korean

Always enjoy our stay at the Hyatt at the Meadows in Pittsburgh. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Breakfast is great in the morning as you don't have to hunt around for somewhere to get breakfast. The rooms are nice and the beds are wonderful. Will continue to stay here when we come to the casino.

2020 update. It's better now. I tried to book a room using the app today & got an error message. It is Handy being able to check prices, properties & progress. Giving 4 stars now because it's still not 100% working .....* Original review*..... This app was great until it stopped working a week ago. And now no one will help me to figure this out. Is it my phone, or is it the app??? I submit error reports, but get no replies. Anyone? Beuller?
World of Hyatt has done an excellent job with its app. It is a all in 1 tool. Good job Hyatt!
I cannot even get past the login screen. Keep getting error message. I'll just use web app 🙄

title: Virtual Hotel Tycoon Manager: Luxury House
description:
Virtual Hotel Tycoon Manager is the best job in these years if you have qualification related to the hotel management. If you have a craze about becoming a virtual manager and want to learn the hotel management, this virtual hotel simulator games will teach you virtually the responsibility of a manager who manages the hotel works & deal with the customers. Responsible for the cleaning of the hotel and manage the rules and the cooking staff duties. Virtual Hotel Tycoon Manager game teaches you the manager level tasks managing and the management of luxury hotel staff assigning them cooking, room service, cleaning & laundry works for customers staying in the hotel. This virtual hotel manager game is very helpful for girls who better understand future management duties. 

Virtual Hotel Tycoon Manager game will start from the hotel entrance lobby. This guesthouse simulator game will give you the better experience for your real life manager job in easy steps. Give room & suites key to the customers and guide them towards their respective rooms. Keep an eye on their rooms as they will ask for room service, laundry or cleaning services. Tap on the service icon to send them to perform their home cleaning activities. Once they check out, receive coins from them to clear levels. Enjoy and become a professional hotel manager in future life like and give us the gaming experience about the Virtual Hotel Tycoon Manager. 

Running a luxury hotel is different than maintaining a restaurant or food cooking cafe. Here you have to give each & every hoteling environment directly to your guests in their rooms. From chicken sandwich to washing dirty clothes, manage all the tasks in professional manner in Virtual Hotel Tycoon Manager. 

Virtual Hotel Tycoon Manager Game play Features:

- Realistic hotel environment with multiple room services
- Collect coins to complete levels
- New offline hotel games for girls
- Learn time management skills being the pro manager

title: Horse Hotel - be the manager of your own ranch!
description:
Run your own Horse Hotel
HorseHotel makes you the owner of your own horse ranch. Take care of the horses, look after their needs, and discover exciting games, until they return to their owners happy. You are responsible for their health and well-being. There is enough space on your green pastures for a lot of horses. Each horse has to be examined in order to see if it’s healthy. Feed them, nurse them, and play with them. Make sure they have everything they need before they go back to their owners.

Exciting horse games and challenges
There are different horse breeds waiting for you, and each breed has its own individual needs. Take a look at the horse’s file to find out what exactly the horse needs. This will help you to provide the best care for the horse. If your horse needs more endurance play the obstacle course minigame. If the horse is lacking in confidence, you can build it up with flatwork exercises in the riding arena. To increase its ability, just play the dressage minigame. But one thing all horses have in common: they need your affection, so don’t neglect to give them treats and pet them!

Expand your hotel to take in more guests
To turn your horse ranch into a luxurious hotel, you will find lots of expansions in the shop which will create more space for more horses. But bear in mind that the bigger your hotel gets, the more demanding your guests will become. Earn more coins by completing missions so you can afford to improve your hotel and take care of more and more horses. Besides maintaining your hotel, caring for your horses is the order of the day: clean out their stables everyday so all the horses enjoy a comfortable stay with you!

❀ Run your own hotel for horses and turn it into a luxurious hotel
❀ Discover exciting minigames
❀ Feed and take care of different breeds of horse
❀ Collect coins, complete quests, and spin the wheel of fortune

Visit us on Facebook: facebook.com/tivolamobile

comments: It's the best game ever I was searching horses games for days and at last I found this amazing game well I think you still have to upgrade the game like we can free ride the horses and feed them put them back in the stable and stuff it would be so much fun if it would be like that and I think you should also upload horse hotel 2 next time and get the best futures and I think that it would be more incredible game then this one but it is a incredible game 😎😊😘🥡

This is an alright game. I have only gotten one horse so far so I wish there would be more options for horses. I also wish there were actual levels and not just days. I also wish there was more to do. There are times where the only thing I have to do is fill the food, water, and clean the "stalls".
Very poor game. Spend more 5 me watching ad's then you do playing the game. Very stupid. Don't download if you don't like ad's cause you will be very disappointed. I'm very disappointed in this app..
Overall this game has great graphics and has a fun way to teach kids responsibility
The game was fun but it got a bit boring and the graphics weren't so good 🐴🐎

title: Paradise Island 2: Hotel Game
description:
The sequel to the legendary game that captured the hearts and minds of over 100 million players is here!

Warning: Paradise Island 2 is highly addictive even if you’ve never played this kind of game before.

"Paradise Island 2" is a game for everyone who loves the sun, the sea, and the sand!

Tear yourself away from work and build your own resort on a sunny island and become the ultimate hotel mogul!

Don’t you think it’s time to start your own business? Wealthy tourists are already flocking to your sunny shores! Entertain them in casinos and entertainment centers, build hotels, restaurants and stores, and provide plenty of amusements! Build your own empire of entertainment! Turn your island into the best resort empire and learn to manage your own business.


Key features:

✔ Build over 300 buildings drawn in a unique style.

✔ Improve and develop your island, invite and entertain guests, and earn huge profits!

✔ Help and feed animals in danger, build your city in tune with nature.

✔ Save an adorable leopard cub and get a loyal pet in return.

✔ Assemble a collection of unique animals and natural phenomena.

✔ Find all the hidden ancient treasures.

✔ Play fascinating mini-games (arcades, platformers, puzzles, pairs, PvP, PvE and more) with daily rankings of the best players and their achievements.

✔ Complete ambitious projects: find and rebuild ancient pyramids, abandoned farms, and world wonders!

✔ Take part in competitions against friends and other city managers for the best places in the game rankings.

✔ Win in fun PvP fights called Beach Battles.

✔ Play in offline mode. Enjoy it on a plane, on the subway, or on the road!

✔ Play with your friends: visit friends’ islands to find hidden objects and receive gifts!

✔ Unique events with special game mechanics and lots of amazing quests.


Build your own tourist city with luxury hotels, receive guests and complete exciting tasks. Paradise is within reach! Take the reins of power and show the world that you can be a successful magnate!

The long-awaited sequel to one of the best economic city-builder simulation games!

comments: I gave you 5 stars that I never done that to other games before. I praised you everywhere & low-key promoting. I let all glitches & errors. But this one, I completed 100 missions that I checked many times & spent things that I saved for months to complete 100 missions, BUT DIDN'T GET PROPER PRIZES. when I ask nicely, it said "database said you only COMPLETE 20 MISSIONS". Like, how do I know it's require 70 then 100 if not BCS I completed the level? And often glitches especially in Turtilliada.
I am new to this game but why is it too slow when opening the app, I just download it a while ago then I tried to open it but it's been 30 mins. It is still loading. I am very upset
I find the game challenging and fun all in one thus far, however it can be slow at building profits. Either way I do like the game very much 😊👌
Hard to get started so slow everything expensive from the start but once get going it might be a good game if you have the patience

Love it although i think that the time to regenerate lives in the turtel game is too long it should take at lease 5min for one life and we should get at lease 5lives but overall this game is relaxing and fun

title: Hotel Transylvania Blast - Puzzle & Blast Games
description:
Welcome to the Hotel Transylvania--where ghouls gather, fiends frolic and Monsters stay a while! Tap to blast puzzle cubes in this free, fun and challenging monster puzzle game.

 Pack your bags for an addicting puzzle blast getaway to the most spooktacular resort hotel around! Team up with Drac, Mavis, Blobby, Murray, Frank and many more to blast though challenging puzzles and complete Quests as the newest Hotel Transylvania Manager! 

 The monsters need you to tap and blast through each unique puzzle and level. Download the free Hotel Transylvania puzzle blast game to play all sorts of puzzle blast fun!

Come stay at Hotel Transylvania and have a blast with the vacation of an after-lifetime! 

 FEATURES:

• Hundreds of challenging puzzles filled with Voodoo Dolls, Spider Plants, Ghosts, and other unique obstacles! Can you tap & blast your way through Hotel Transylvania?
• Tap on the Stake, Spider, Broom & Wand Boosts to blast your way through the puzzle board!
• Collect your favorite Monsters; each with their own unique Power! Stuck on a puzzle? Call on your favorite monster to blast your way past!
• Complete dozens of Quests as Hotel Manager, assisting Quasimodo and the rest of the hotel staff. Tap & blast puzzle boards to become the best Hotel Transylvania manager! 
• Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards including Monster Pieces to summon new characters! Each new monster gives you a special boost in your puzzle blast fun.
• Simple to start, challenging at heart! Keep the puzzle game fun rolling, but don’t run out of hearts!

The free Hotel Transylvania Puzzle Blast game is fun for monsters and ghouls everywhere! Download the Hotel Transylvania Puzzle Blast game for free today!

comments: Level 404 is impassible. The goals are reversed. Says 8 boxes, 9 bats. Problem is, there's 9 boxes, 8 bats. Once you've collected all the bats on the game board, it still says you didn't pass the level. I've completed all goals several times, but cannot pass the level because of the missing bat. Please help. I have reached out to support staff through the game, no response. Sent email to the email address listed, email was returned as undeliverable.

So far so good, few minor things I'm sure will be fixed, freezing being the biggest. A recent issue with level 168 cost me two lives. The eye ball jars fall and leave a blank space where a bubble was placed and I could not pop it because no piece was there, just the bubble, and the rocket nor bomb would destroy it, even spent 200 coin to get the Steaks and it wouldn't let me use it on the bubble, had to lose and play again and the same thing happened, had to lose and play again. Still great game

Never seems to fail. As soon as you buy a bundle pack . The game works for a little bit then goes into level loads but screen blacks out. Level 95 . Sorry to say the money I spent It wasn't worth it. Refund would be nice. New game I took a chance. Bad choice on my part. Sorry guys

I like this movie. This game has potential to be more fun. Takes too long to earn. ? Some levels are very hard to get out of. If you buy your ways out what fun is tgat...its not honest... Whew...ive cut back on pkaying...may delete if you dont fix these items... Your loss... Thnx...cece in nc usa🦉

I love Hotel Transylvania, so this game is awesome for me. However, some of the levels can be quite hard too pass. Also, I wish you didn't HAVE too buy Mavis with REAL MONEY, I would love too play as Mavis but I don't want to spend real money on a game, I don't think it's fair tbh. At the very least you should be able too unlock her as a playable character and NOT HAVE TOO BUY HER WITH REAL MONEY.

title: Tripadvisor Hotel, Flight & Restaurant Bookings
description:
Plan your vacation and book an amazing trip, with millions of travel recommendations and reviews from travelers like you on hotels, must-do experiences, top places to eat and other nearby vacation hidden gems. Tripadvisor is the perfect travel planner, helping you book a table at restaurants and compare low prices when booking hotels and flights for your next trip.

The Tripadvisor app is the ultimate travel planner, and is free and easy to use:

• Access over 830 million reviews of hotels, flights, things to do, vacation rentals, and restaurants from travelers like you
• Use our planning tool, Trips, to save and organize your travel ideas for hotels, restaurants, tours and attractions and see them together on a map
• Find great deals on hotels by comparing the lowest prices from more than 200 booking sites worldwide
• Search and book the world’s largest collection of tours, attractions and experiences
• Modify or cancel most tour, attraction and experience bookings for free
• Access mobile tickets for booked tours and activities
• Use Google Pay or PayPal to make tour or activity bookings
• Find great food wherever you are and reserve tables at local restaurants
• Compare airfares and find great deals on flights
• Browse and book Travelers’ Choice award-winning hotels, experiences, restaurants and more
• Get answers on specific questions from other like-minded travelers in the Tripadvisor forums
• Add your own reviews and photos of places you’ve visited
• Quickly discover nearby hidden gem travel recommendations, find and book must-see things to do while on your trip as well as reserve tables at great restaurants
• View traveler and local recommended places on a map while on your trip

While on a trip, use the app to view nearby hidden gems, hotels, restaurants and top vacation tours and attractions on a map -- then save ideas for later, or book your favorites on the spot and visit a city later. The Tripadvisor travel planner app uses your location to send you great travel recommendations and we  share this information with trusted third party partners to provide you with a better experience. Note that your location is collected even if the app is in the background.

recentChanges:
We frequently update the Tripadvisor app to make it even more useful to travelers like you. Here’s what’s new:

• Various performance improvements and bug fixes to help you find great places nearby, wherever you are
comments: Very good app! If you're planning a trip or even looking for local options, you need this app. It's definitely one of my most used apps for a reason. It's very informative and helpful. It allows you to save things you find at a location to your "places" list that you create so when you go, open your saved destination and have at it. I planned a weeklong Vegas trip of things to do, places to eat, etc this way and never missed a thing. I ran out of vacation before I did options! Highly recommended

This app is slowly improving. Most things you can do via the web interface, you can do with the app. However irritations such as embedded links not always opening, and the Inbox being slow to update private messages, mean that its not quite there yet.

Have used this app for years. It has generally been very good. However I would suggest it would be more user friendly if a review writer was able to get into a review he has made. The reason being that some times after a report has been posted a writer picks up an error he has made. At present time it is a real drama to try and sort it out. If the writer could get into the review and edit it there and then, no dramas that would be a real plus. Just a thought. Regards Kiwi nev No action yet.

This app is not very good. It tries to do a lot, but does it poorly. To search for a specific listing you're better off using Google. I tried writing a review and adding photos, and the app is painful in this regard - it just doesn't work properly. If you can, use the desktop version of the website, because it's less painful. You would after all these years that the developers might finally get it right. Sadly, this is not so.

For checking out Hotel reviews it's fine. But I don't like it for booking a trip. Does not give clear per person pricing. Mostly just per night cost of a room. I want to know exactly what I am paying for. Even for rides to the Airport it says may include an extra charge. Then doesn't say how much. Think I will keep using a Travel agent. I don't want any surprise charges later.

title: Red Planet Hotels
description:
At Red Planet Hotels, Asia's leading value hotel, we focus on what's important to you: location, value, and cleanliness. All our hotels are:

•    Located in city centre locations, close to public transport
•    Priced at competitive rates with free high-speed wifi
•    Well maintained and spotlessly clean

Our cutting edge app is designed to be your companion at every step of your trip, from making and managing your bookings to making sure you have a fantastic stay.

QUICK AND EASY BOOKING EXPERIENCE
A few taps is all it takes to find a hotel book your stay.

10% OFF ALL BOOKINGS, ALWAYS
Easily sign up for our REMEMBERED loyalty programme and get 10% off all your bookings. Once you're signed up, simply turn your phone on its side to view your virtual REMEMBERED card.

CHAT WITH FRONT DESK
From the minute you book till the day you check out, you're able to instantly message our staff with any questions or special requests.

IN-HOUSE PHONE
Traveling with friends? Make free room-to-room calls or call our front desk from within our app.

GET LOCAL RECOMMENDATIONS AND DISCOUNTS
New to the city? Our app provides you with the most popular attractions and dining venues during your stay. BONUS: Remembered members get access to exclusive discounts at selected venues!

DIRECTIONS TO HOTEL
One tap is all it takes to get directions back to the hotel for a great night's sleep

As always, we’re working hard to give you the best experience possible so don't hesitate to send us your suggestions support@redplanethotels.com.
descriptionHTML:
At Red Planet Hotels, Asia's leading value hotel, we focus on what's important to you: location, value, and cleanliness. All our hotels are:

• Located in city centre locations, close to public transport
• Priced at competitive rates with free high-speed wifi
• Well maintained and spotlessly clean

Our cutting edge app is designed to be your companion at every step of your trip, from making and managing your bookings to making sure you have a fantastic stay.

QUICK AND EASY BOOKING EXPERIENCE
A few taps is all it takes to find a hotel book your stay.

10% OFF ALL BOOKINGS, ALWAYS
Easily sign up for our REMEMBERED loyalty programme and get 10% off all your bookings. Once you're signed up, simply turn your phone on its side to view your virtual REMEMBERED card.

CHAT WITH FRONT DESK
From the minute you book till the day you check out, you're able to instantly message our staff with any questions or special requests.

IN-HOUSE PHONE
Traveling with friends? Make free room-to-room calls or call our front desk from within our app.

GET LOCAL RECOMMENDATIONS AND DISCOUNTS
New to the city? Our app provides you with the most popular attractions and dining venues during your stay. BONUS: Remembered members get access to exclusive discounts at selected venues!

DIRECTIONS TO HOTEL
One tap is all it takes to get directions back to the hotel for a great night's sleep

As always, we’re working hard to give you the best experience possible so don't hesitate to send us your suggestions support@redplanethotels.com.
summary: Red Planet. Redefining Asia’s value hotels. Bookings have never been easier.
recentChanges:
Welcome queueless online check-in — 24 hours before your arrival, securely pay for the room and prepare the hotel staff to roll out the red carpet. Or you can still check in at the lobby, too.

Fixes and improvements

— Adding personal details when booking a room was a bit jumbled. We split up the guest information from the payment details. Now you know where to do what.
— If you can’t resist pressing big red buttons, we made ours bigger and easier to, well, press.
comments: Very uaeful & easy to use... 👍👍👍
Great app. Being able to chat with the front desk hassle free is a great experience. They reply in a timely and satisfying manner.

This is app is not working! You need to do a lot of steps to have a confirmation code! Been waiting the email to send me the code but nothing. Just a waste of time better provide telephones here in the hotel!

The app gives a very personal experience both in booking and customer service. Feels like you can reach the hotel staff anytime anywhere if you have questions and clarifications. Booking is instant and information is clear.

it was amazing..... the security is great and all the staff are fantastic and nice.... looking forward to have more stay in this hotel... download the app to have more treats and perks... till next time😊😎

title: Idle Hotel Tycoon
description:
is a free commercial simulation game for everyone.

Start your business adventure, live like a real business tycoon, and simply touch the screen to get money!
Use your unique vision to invest in the hottest industries, expand your market and earn more money.
Use your best business mind to create the unique business empire and become a legendary business tycoon.

Game features:
The gameplay is easy and fun, just touch the screen to make money
No need to be online all the time, even when you are offline you can get money
Expand your own territory, build more stores, do different businesses
Learn money management and invest in the most profitable industry of the moment
Leisurely rich life, hire business partners work for you
Upgrade your store to unlock more fashion look
Rich and interesting tasks, complete certain conditions to get big rewards

Ready to become a legend in this world full of business opportunities? Move your finger and touch the screen to realize the dream of your business tycoon!

developerAddress: 7th Floor, Zhengda Lecheng, No. 699, Zhongshan South Road, Xuhui District, Shanghai
recentChanges: The gameplay is easy and fun, just touch the screen to make money
comments: I like that this game can be played offline if it needs to be. I'm not sure about some of the names of the unlockable buildings. I don't know why this is called "hotel tycoon" that makes the whole thing confusing because it's not like a hotel at all. Better names would have been "idle town mall" or "idle town centre", possibly even "idle town recreation zone". I love that this isn't a pay to get everything kind of game, GREAT job! 🤩

The graphics is good it's like in real life-you could play offline but 1 thing tho is that it's not a hotel game it's a super market tycoon just like that other game but its on Apple only I guess,but now we have a game like this on android. : ) but i guess so that they didn't get a copyright......smart.

Would have really enjoyed this game however 10 minutes in ads resulted in video didnt end properly. Bit of a let down to be honest. I shall be moving on to a different idle game. I may come back and try again one day.

Just started the game tonight and liked it a lot...until now. At first, the video ads were fine and bonuses were great. Suddenly though, every time I try to watch an ad, it says "Video 7 did not end properly." I cleared all relevant caches but that did not help. Is there a way to fix this? I am missing out on millions of dollars from the ads!!

I already know I will get the same message I got on my review of your hospital app. "We will continue to optimize our work and blah blah blah". It's the same problem on both games, the ads just stop working. Please find the money to pay the service that provides you ads so that the people who download your games can enjoy their experience. You should have worked out all these problems before making it available.

title: Treebo: Hotel Booking App |100% Free Cancellation
description:
Looking for a comfortable stay at pocket-friendly prices? Treebo hotels offer just that and more. Book rooms starting from ₹999 with our online hotel booking app and enjoy free WiFi, complimentary wholesome breakfast, clean rooms with AC, fresh linen, and other amenities during your stay!

Download Treebo hotel booking app and get flat 50% OFF on all hotels and a guaranteed quality stay with all amenities.

With 600+ Treebo hotels in more than 100+ cities, you can now book couple-friendly hotels anywhere across India. A simple search for Hotels in Bangalore, Mumbai, Delhi, Chennai, Kolkata, Mangalore, Goa, Jaipur, Vishakapatnam, etc gives you numerous stay options at competent prices to choose from. You can also find Treebo hotels in Sawai Madhopur, Tawang, Shimla, Satara, Wayanad etc.

Book Treebo hotels on the go
Just landed in a new city or in an ongoing Uber/Ola ride? Simply log into the app or search for our best selling properties listed on the Online Travel Aggregators (OTA) like BookingDotcom, Cleartrip, Expedia or on meta searches like Google and Trivago. Choose hotels that suit your needs with a tap of your finger.

Why choose a Treebo stay?

Room for all purposes: Book a Treebo and leave it up to us to take care of all of your travel plans - be it business, vacation, or leisure. Check-in with your colleagues, family & friends, partner or solo and enjoy all comfort and services during your stay.

Transparent and Upfront: We offer more than what you pay for. You can get amenities like a fully functional gym, swimming pool, in-house restaurant and more

Budget-friendly rooms guaranteed: Book Treebo budget hotels with the best amenities, at lowest price only on Treebo’s app.

Irresistible hotel deals: Love discounts on your hotel bookings? Get exciting hotel booking deals and coupons on the app and book cheap rooms to save big on travels.

Swift booking: Pressed for time? Last-minute bookings? No issues. Treebo online hotel booking app is user-friendly and offers a hassle-free hotel booking experience. Book hotels online easily from anywhere, anytime.

Maps to guide: Getting lost is not an option with Treebo. Our maps and landmarks help you get to your hotel without breaking a sweat.

Book now, pay at the hotel: Treebo app allows you to book the hotel of your choice online and pay after you get there.

Compare and then confirm: Compare hotel prices, amenities, reviews and ratings, location and more. Confirm only when you find the hotel of your choice.

Easy payment: You can either pay while booking or pay at the hotel through credit/debit cards, Netbanking, Mobikwik, PhonePe, Amazon Pay, etc.

How to book hotels with the Treebo online hotel booking app?
Book a perfect stay with just 3 taps on our app:

►Download the Treebo app and enter the location for searching hotels or use your current location.
►Check out different hotels, their prices & amenities, reviews and ratings. Add relevant filters to make your search easy and precise.
►Hit the “Book” button. Choose to pay now or at the hotel by selecting the option and confirm your stay.
Explore your options with Tryst, Trend &Trip

Treebo hotels offer new options - Treebo Tryst, Trip & Trend for frequent travellers, solo backpackers, budget hotel seekers and others.

Treebo Trip: The economy rooms offer you basic comforts such as clean rooms, unlimited basic breakfast, branded Treebo toiletries and a comfortable stay.
Treebo Tryst: The standard rooms are tastefully designed and come with a comfortable bed, in-room coffee or tea maker, unlimited wholesome breakfast option and branded toiletries for use. 
Treebo Trend: Book a Treebo Trend at prime location for a perfect stay at upscale rooms with elegant decor and adequate furniture. Enjoy lavish buffet breakfast at the in-house, full-service restaurant.

This is the best hotel booking application. And this is really awesome application. And best features and benefits this application. I have a great experience to using it..

It is fabulous and amazing application. Very best rooms available this app and i am fully satisfied this app. My friend booking room and very injoy full.
